V03vinv172u:0: fol. 513ff. first ed. in MSV IV 213ff.
V03vinv172u:3: kauṇḍinyo nandīpālaś ca modakā udakaṃ pibet /
V03vinv172u:5: karakaḥ kalabhuś caiva viśvabhug vanarathena ca /
V03vinv172u:7: yadā āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ( iti)
V03vinv172u:10: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:11: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena karma kṛtam yena bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:13: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:14: kauṇḍinyenaiva karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:15: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:19: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:20: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:21: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:24: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe varṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:25: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:26: *sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati karakacchedake parvate;
V03vinv172u:27: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv172u:30: adrākśus te goṣṭhikās taṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
V03vinv172u:35: sahadarśanāc ca prasādajātāḥ sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:37: teṣām evaṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kecin mahāsamudram avatīrṇāh;
V03vinv172u:43: cchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:45: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtah;
V03vinv172u:51: pañca sahaśravaṇād eva karakacchedakāt parvatād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv172u:52: ṣaḍbhis tenaiva saṃvegena vīryam avalambya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:53: pañca paścād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praveṣṭum (SBV II 3)
V03vinv172u:58: sa ca śākaṭikas tasya śakaṭasārthasyāgrato yāyī;
V03vinv172u:65: mamāgrato gacchato na śakyam anena śakaṭasārthena sārdhaṃ gantum;
V03vinv172u:69: bhavantaḥ kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte vayaṃ vilambitā ity anenāsmākam eṣā codanā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:72: yady apy antarhito dharmaḥ kāśyapasya mahāmuneḥ /
V03vinv172u:74: parikṣayaṃ na yāsyanti yady apy asmākam āsrāvāḥ /
V03vinv172u:76: te vārāṇasīṃ praviśya piṇḍapātaṃ caritvā punar api karakacchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā dhyānādhyayanayogenāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:80: ayam eva sa karakacchedakaḥ parvato yatra mayā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paryupāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:84: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:86: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:87: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:88: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya tatprathamataḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:89: māṃ ca bhagavān śākyamuniḥ saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agraṃ nirdiśed iti.
V03vinv172u:91: yo 'sau tena kālena samayena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām (SBV II 4)
V03vinv172u:95: tatpraṇidhānvaśād etarhi bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:96: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
V03vinv172u:99: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
V03vinv172u:102: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:108: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayachettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:109: kiṃ bhadanta ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya bhagavatā ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:115: kauṇḍinyenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:119: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:120: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:121: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:122: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:123: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:126: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:129: deva ācaritaṃ madhyadeśe yo 'bhirūpo bhavati prāsādikaḥ sa sundara ity ucyate;
V03vinv172u:130: ayaṃ ca dārakaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ,
V03vinv172u:138: dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam.
V03vinv172u:139: bhūyo 'pi rājñaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:140: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:142: yasminn eva divase vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:146: deva asya janmani vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir abhūt;
V03vinv172u:147: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalibhūr iti nāmeti;
V03vinv172u:149: kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantam;
V03vinv172u:151: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:152: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:153: yannv aham agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:165: varaṃ vane valkalacīravāsasā phalāśinā vyāḍamṛgaiḥ sahoṣitam /
V03vinv172u:166: na rājyahetor vadhabandhatāḍanaṃ budhena kartuṃ paralokabhīruṇā // iti;
V03vinv172u:168: yat khalu kumāra jānīyās tvam asmākam ekaputraḥ priyo manāpaḥ kṣānto 'pratikūlaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176: tatra kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ ekam api bhaktacchedam akārṣīd,
V03vinv172u:180: atha rāja brahmadattaḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram idam avocat: (SBV II 6)
V03vinv172u:181: yat khalu tāta kumāra jānīyā duścaraṃ brahmacaryam,
V03vinv172u:189: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:190: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:191: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:193: dānāni ca dehi puṇyāni ca kuru;
V03vinv172u:195: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ antaḥpuram amātyān paurohitāṃś codyojayati;
V03vinv172u:197: evaṃ devety antaḥpurāmātyapaurohitā yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:198: upasaṃkramya kāśisundaraṃ kumāraṃ idam avocan: yat khalu (A 426b)
V03vinv172u:210: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:211: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:212: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:218: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ kāśisunadrasya kumārasya pāṃsukrīḍanakāmātyaputrān paurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca kumārāṇ udyojayati;
V03vinv172u:219: aṅga tāvad kumārakāḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram utthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:220: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca rājño brahmadattasya pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:223: yat khalu somya kumāra jānīyās tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī;
V03vinv172u:234: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:235: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:236: ehi tvaṃ somya kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:243: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ ca yena rājā brahmadattas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:257: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:262: atha kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ maṇḍānupūrvīṃ kṛtvā kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca sañjanya vārāṇasyāḥ ca niṣkramya ṛṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:267: tasyaitayā matryā vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvāsam āpadyante;
V03vinv172u:286: gatvā śāntavihārasamanveṣaṇayā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramann anupūrveṇa pituḥ santakam udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:287: tena tasmin paryaṭatā śāntaḥ pradeśo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:289_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena kalabhū rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
V03vinv172u:290: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya khedam āpanno middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:291: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmas tasminn udyāne itaś ca amutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:292: yāvat paśyanti kṣāntivādinam ṛṣim ekānte śānteryāpathe niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv172u:293: dṛṣṭvā ca punar gauravāpyāyitacittasantatyaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā parivāryāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:294: kṣāntivādī ṛṣis tās striyo śāntatareṇeryāpathena dharmaṃ deśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:295: yāvat kalabhū rājā nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya prabuddho na paśyaty antaḥpurajanam;
V03vinv172u:296: sa khaḍgam ādāya yuvatijanaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:297: yāvat paśyati kṣāntivādinaṃ riṣiṃ parivārya avasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:298: dṛṣṭvā ca punar īrṣyājanitakrodhaparyākulīkṛtātmabhāvaḥ tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:299: mātṛgrāmo rājñaḥ sakāśam avasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto vidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:306: idānīṃ kṣāntivādī vā bhavān na veti tena tasya hastau chinnau;
V03vinv172u:313: yadi tilaśatam api kṛtvā kṣepsyase kāyam urvyām
V03vinv172u:315: yasya mama śubhā maitrī cetasi paribhāvitā sadā kṣāntim
V03vinv172u:316: tāṃ notsahe vihantuṃ sutam iva sutavatsalā jananī //
V03vinv172u:317: sa evaṃ gāthābhir gītena rujaṃ vinodya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:318: yathaiṣa rājā kleśābhiniviṣṭabuddhir mamākāryākārya aṅgapratyaṅgāni chinatti;
V03vinv172u:320: kuśalamūlena kleśagaṇam ātmīyam abhinirjitya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syām;
V03vinv172u:321: tataḥ prajñāśastreṇasya ākāryākārya tatprathamataḥ kleśān pramlāyeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:322: atha yā devatā kṣāntivādiny abhiprasannā sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:323: anena kalirājena ayam ṛṣir adūṣy anapakārī karacaraṇaśūnyo vyavasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:328: kṛtsnaṃ ca jīvalokam ājñāpaya nāśayiṣyāmi // iti;
V03vinv172u:330: karacaraṇanāśavikalaṃ kṛtaṃ mama śarīram ākulaṃ yena /
V03vinv172u:331: tasyāpi pāpam aṇv api necchāmi kutaḥ punar adūṣino jagataḥ //
V03vinv172u:332: tasyāpi yā devatā vārāṇasyām ītis tata itaḥ sṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:343: yā devatā kṣāntivādino ṛṣer abhiprasannā sā kupitā;
V03vinv172u:349: balimālyopahāraṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpayitavyā sa ca ṛṣir iti;
V03vinv172u:357: tad yuṣmābhir ītivyupaśamārthaṃ śvo balimālyopahārasametair udyānaṃ gatvā tasyāḥ pūjā saṃvidhātavyā iti. (SBV II 10)
V03vinv172u:358: janakāyas tām eva rātriṃ balimālyopahāraṃ samudānīya tad udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:360: tato janakāyena śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā devatāsthāne ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sā devatā kṣamitā;
V03vinv172u:361: tato rājā ṛṣeḥ kṣāntivādinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:362: kṣamasva me maharṣe yan mayā viṣayādhyavasitena krodhaparyākulīkṛtamatinā tavāparāddham iti;
V03vinv172u:367: gātreṣu vahasi śastraṃ maitrī me sarvasatveṣu /
V03vinv172u:368: yadi saṃśayo 'tra bhavatāṃ paśyata rudhiraṃ prasannaṃ me // iti;
V03vinv172u:370: pāpakarmakārī sa rājā prātihāryasandarśanenāpi na śraddhatte;
V03vinv172u:375: tato bodhisatvaḥ chinnāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni yathāsve sthāne sthāpayitvā satyopayācanayā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:376: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu tvayā rājan yathā na me /
V03vinv172u:377: āghāto 'sti susūkṣmo 'pi syān me kāyas tathā purā // iti;
V03vinv172u:380: aho vratam idaṃ siddham aho dharmas svanuṣṭhitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:381: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu yasya te nāsti vikriyā //
V03vinv172u:382: rājā kalabhūḥ sāntaḥpurāmātyapauranajānapadaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:386: yo 'sau kalibhū rājā eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyabhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:387: yan mayā tasyāntike maitracittam utpādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
V03vinv172u:388: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāsya ākāryākārya kleśān chedayeyam iti; (SBV II 11)
V03vinv172u:389: tatpraṇidhānavaśād etarhi tathāgatena asya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:391: pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:392: yadā bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:393: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:395: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani mayaitāni aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:398: The story of the two merchants
V03vinv172u:399: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau abhūvatāṃ viśvabhuk suyātraś ca;
V03vinv172u:403: tenaikākinā vīryam āsthāya anācāryeṇānupādhyāyakena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān saṃmukhīkṛtya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣākṛtā;
V03vinv172u:404: tasya te sārthikā sārthavāham apaśyantaḥ itaś cāmutaḥ ca samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:405: yadā sarvathā nārāgayantas tadānīṃ viśvabhujaḥ sārthavāho 'navalokya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:411: tato viśvabhuk sārthavāha aśītyā vaṇiksahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ suyātraṃ sārthavāhaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ udyānāvasathatapovaneṣu;
V03vinv172u:413: kasmāt tvaṃ sārtham apahāya pravrajita iti;
V03vinv172u:414: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:416: tena tāny aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣopasaṃhāropasaṃhṛtāny uktāni:
V03vinv172u:418: asmai kārāḥ kṛtā niyataṃ phaladāyakā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:420: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo' sāv viśvabhuk sārthavāha aham eva (SBV II 12)
V03vinv172u:422: yāni vaṇiksahasrāṇy etāny eva tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi;
V03vinv172u:423: tadāpy etāni mayāmiṣeṇopasaṃhṛtya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:424: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasenopasaṃhṛtya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:425: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:426: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:429: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitā iti;
V03vinv172u:432_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:432_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:433_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:433_1: sārthavāhabhūtena paṃcakaiḥ kāntāramārge kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptāḥ salilaṃ vinā
V03vinv172u:433_2: prāṇair viyujyamānā devatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā māhendrā salilavarṣeṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:436: The story of the thirsty caravan
V03vinv172u:437: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ viśvabhuṅ nāma sārthavāhaḥ paṃcavaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvyavaharann alpasalilakāntāramārgaṃ pratipannaḥ anupūrveṇa vindhyāṭavīṃ saṃprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:440: paṃca tu vaṇijaḥ salilam alabhamānā atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:441: viśvabhuk sārthavāhas tān tathāvidhān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākaṃpitahṛdayo ūrdhvamukho devatāyācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:442: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādyā devā yena satyena satyavacanena mama sarveṣu samapravṛttā dayā anena satyena satyavacanena māhendro devo varṣatu;
V03vinv172u:448: tena tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ enāsau vaṇiksārthaḥ saṃtarpitaḥ kāntāramārgaṃ samatikrāntaḥ. (SBV II 13)
V03vinv172u:450: yo 'sau viśvabhuk sārthavāhaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:451: ye te paṃca vaṇijaḥ salilavirahād atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtā eta eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:452: tadāpy ete mayā salilena saṃtarpya kāntāramārgād uttāritāḥ;
V03vinv172u:453: etarhy api mayā ete saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāritāḥ.
V03vinv172u:454: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ,
V03vinv172u:455: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:456: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:459_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:459_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:461_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:461_1: sārthavāhabhūtena ete svajīvitaparityāgena mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:464: The story of the merchant Dhanaratha
V03vinv172u:469: te tasya sārthavāhasya anyonyakathālāpasaumukhyā anyonyakṛtapraṇayā saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:470: yāvad anupūrveṇa samudratīram anuprāptaiḥ pratyekaṃ vahanāni sajjīkṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:472: sārthavāha vayaṃ tvayā vinā dhṛtiṃ na labhāmahe;
V03vinv172u:474: yady evam ihaivābhiruhataḥ vahanāni mucyantām iti;
V03vinv172u:479: yadā vahanaṃ vināśam upaiti tadā mama kaṇṭhe lageta,
V03vinv172u:493: yo 'sau dhanaratho nāma sārthavāha aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:494: ye te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ tadāpy ete mayā mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:495: etarhy apy mayā saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ.
V03vinv172u:498: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:499: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdati?
V03vinv172u:501: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:506: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ saṃdhano nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:507: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:512: tad yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ dvādaśavarṣikam annapānam asti tair madviṣaye vastavyam;
V03vinv172u:517: bhoḥ puruṣa asti koṣṭhāgāre dvādaśavārṣikam annapānam iti;
V03vinv172u:523: mahad durbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāraḥ durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:524: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakā prāntāśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:525: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre anyatamasminn āśramapade paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:526: yadā durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhīto janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ tadā teṣāṃ piṇḍakā samucchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:527: te sarva eva saṃbhūya saṃdhanasya gṛhapates sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ kathayanti: gṛhapate,
V03vinv172u:528: asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānām piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:532: asti bhoḥ puruṣa asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānam yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:534: saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍaka upanibaddha iti;
V03vinv172u:535: śrutvā aparāṇi paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni saṃdhānasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni;
V03vinv172u:537: gṛhapate asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:539: āryakā dattam eva yuṣmākaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayata iti;
V03vinv172u:540: te kathayanti gṛhapate anye te vayam anye iti;
V03vinv172u:542: yady evaṃ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:544: bhoḥ puruṣa asti asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād asya ca pravrajitasahasrasya dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:552: tataḥ saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā dānaśālā māpitā dānādhisthāyikaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ kālārocakaś ca;
V03vinv172u:554: tasya pratyekabuddhasahasrasya yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ so 'tīva prāsādikaḥ chatrākāraśirās tāṃ parṣadaṃ chatrīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:555: saṃdhānasya gṛhapater duhitā tasya saṃghasthavirasya (SBV II 16)
V03vinv172u:557: yāvad apareṇa samayena bhaktakāle devo varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:558: tataḥ tayā dārikayā saṃghasthavirasya mūrdhni chatraṃ dhāritam;
V03vinv172u:559: bhuktasya ca pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:560: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ yādṛśo 'yam āryaḥ yathā cāyaṃ chatrīkṛtya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ evam aham api chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:562: yāsau saṃdhānasdya gṛhapater duhitā eṣa evāsau (A 431a)
V03vinv172u:564: yad anena kumārikābhūtena pratyekabuddhasaṃghasthavirasya chatraṃ vidhārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti,
V03vinv172u:565: tad etarhi sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadam avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:566: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:567: yadā bhagavatā ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:568: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmantam ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:570_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:570_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi
V03vinv172u:571_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:571_1: vinipatitaśarīreṇa tiryagyonāv upapannena aśitikīṭasahasrāṇi kauṇḍinyaṃ kīṭikībhūtam
V03vinv172u:578: aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo mahāsamudre kacchapeṣūpapannas teṣām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:579: yāvat paṃcavaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudram (SBV II 17)
V03vinv172u:582: yāvad vahanaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayena vyasanam āpāditam;
V03vinv172u:586: alaṃ bhavatāṃ viṣādena mama pṛṣṭham abhiruheta ahaṃ vas tārayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:590: sa śrāntakāyaḥ teṣu saṃkīrṇeṣu grīvām abhiprasārya suptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:592: tasmād ekā kīṭikā paribhramantī gandhaṃ ghrātvā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv172u:593: tatas taṃ mahatpramāṇākāravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritagatipracārikī kīṭikānagaram abhigatā;
V03vinv172u:594: svasvasaṃjñayā kīṭikāḥ prabodhya aśītiḥ kīṭikāsahasrāṇy ādāya kacchapasakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:595: tataḥ taṃ suotaṃ mṛtam iva niśceṣṭaprāṇaṃ bhakṣayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:596: yadāsya sthūlaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti śramanaparikhinno gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdho na cetayate;
V03vinv172u:597: yadā tu marmasthāneṣu māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti tadā prabuddhaḥ paśyati kīṭikābhiḥ sarvaṃ śarīram ākīrṇam;
V03vinv172u:600: vā saṃparivartayiṣye vā niyatam etāḥ praghātayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:602: iti viditvā chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:603: yathā mayā etāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:604: tāny evam aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya saddharmarasena saṃtarpayeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:606: yo 'sau kīṭikānāṃ mārgoddeśika eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:607: yāni tāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi tam āgamya māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:610: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:611: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:612: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā (SBV II 18)
V03vinv172u:613: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:614: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:616_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:616_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya
V03vinv172u:617_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
V03vinv172u:617_1: ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:620: The story of the king Vajrabāhu
V03vinv172u:621: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ vajrabāhur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:622: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:627: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakādhvagayācanakebhyo yo yenārthī tasmai tad anuprayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:628_0: evaṃ deva ity amātyā rajño vajrabāhor pratiśutya vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu
V03vinv172u:630: samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca yakṣā ojohārā nirvāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:631: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:632: te gopālakān paśupālakān tṛṇahārakān kāṣṭhahārakān pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:633: bhavanto na yūyam asmān bibhīta? (SBV II 19)
V03vinv172u:634: iti; bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ bibhīmaḥ yeṣām asmākaṃ rājā maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitādhyāśayena trir divasasya maitrīṃ samāpadyate?
V03vinv172u:635_0: iti; tataḥ te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya vārāṇasyām caturṣu dvāreṣu dānaśālāṃ
V03vinv172u:635_1: pratyavekṣya vajrabāhuṃ rājānaṃ maitryā vyutthitaṃ jñātvā vinītaveṣadhāriṇo rajñaḥ
V03vinv172u:636: upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:637: deva bubhukṣitāḥ smāhāreṇa anugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:639: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:645: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vīthyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ rudhiraṃ prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:650: kutaḥ sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasya pīḍām akṛtvā?
V03vinv172u:651: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:656: na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:657: kuśalāḥ bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:658: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śastranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:659: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtvā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣāḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:661: yo 'sau vajrabāhur nāma rājā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:662: ye amī paṃca yakṣā ojohārās te evāmī paṃca bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:663: tadāpy ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ) ;
V03vinv172u:665: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:666_0: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe
V03vinv172u:666_1: yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ
V03vinv172u:667: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena (SBV II 20)
V03vinv172u:668: saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:670_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa yāvat sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
V03vinv172u:670_1: paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme
V03vinv172u:671: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa pūrvavat duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:675: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ maitrabalo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:677: yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca ojohārā yakṣāḥ kasmiṇcid eva aparādhe pravāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:678: te taṃ janapadam anvāhiṇḍya vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:683: deva vārāṇasyām atīva janakāyo mṛta iti;
V03vinv172u:688: tad yuṣmābhir api sarvasatvānugatā maitrī manasi kartavyā;
V03vinv172u:690: te sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ manasi kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:693: te praveśam alabhamānā gopālakāṃ paśupālakān tṛṇahārakāṃ kāṣṭhahārakāṃ pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:698: vayaṃ hi yad rājā maitrabalaś cintayati tac cintayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:702: idam atra kāraṇaṃ yena vayam idānīm avatāraṃ na labhāmaha iti;
V03vinv172u:706: yāvad apareṇa samayena maitrabalo rājā bahir udyānāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:707: tatas te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya śānteryāpathena rājānam upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvocuḥ:
V03vinv172u:717: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vithyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:718: deva sadyohatarudhiramāṃsabhakṣā vayaṃ sadyohatena māṃsenānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:720: kutas sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasyapīḍām akṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:721: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:723: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta iti yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:725: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:726: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:727: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śāstranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:728: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣā paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:730: yo 'sau maitrabalo nāma rājā 'bhūd aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:733: tadāpy ete mayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:734: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:740: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:741: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:743: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām. (SBV II 22)
V03vinv172u:745: The story of Nandapāla the Potter (= Ghaṭīkarasutta, MN 81, cf. MV I 319ff.)
V03vinv172u:746: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vaibhiḍiṅgī nāma grāmanigamo 'bhūd ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca bahujanamanuṣyaś ca;
V03vinv172u:747: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nyagrodho nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:749: vaibhiḍiṅgīṃ paribhuṃkte sotsadāṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakāṃ kṛkinā rājñā brahmadeyāṃ dattām;
V03vinv172u:750_0: nyagrodhasya khalu bhikṣavo brāhmaṇamahaśālasya uttaro nāmo māṇavo 'ntevāsī upeto
V03vinv172u:750_1: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyām anākṣipto jātivādena gotravādena ca yāvad āsaptamaṃ
V03vinv172u:751: adhyāpako mantradharo trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāraṃgataḥ sanighaṇṭukaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapaṃcamānāṃ sādṛśo vyākarakaḥ,
V03vinv172u:753: nyagrodhasya brāhmaṇamahaśālasya paṃcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayanti;
V03vinv172u:754: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:756: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:758: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:759: duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatya āgataphalābhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalo na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati; nānyatra,
V03vinv172u:760: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvā ekāntam upanikṣipya evam āha:
V03vinv172u:761: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu iti;
V03vinv172u:765: uttarasya māṇavasya mitraṃ suhṛd vayasyako ca nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:766: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:768: nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:769: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:770: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:771: tena khalu samayena uttaro māṇavaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamānena māṇavakagaṇaparivṛto māṇavakagaṇapuraskṛto vaibhiḍiṅgyān niryāti;
V03vinv172u:772: bahir vaibhiḍiṅgyāḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitukāmaḥ adrākṣīd uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:774: kutas tvaṃ somya nandīpāla etarhy āgacchasi?
V03vinv172u:775: ito 'haṃ somya uttara etarhy āgacchāmi kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paryupāsya;
V03vinv172u:778: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭenālaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:782: mā tvaṃ somya uttara evaṃ vada:
V03vinv172u:787: dvir api trir api nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ uttaraṃ māṇavakam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:790: dvir api trir api uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avoat:
V03vinv172u:791: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭena alaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:795: mā tvaṃ somyottara evaṃ vada kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:799: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkara uttarasya māṇavasya ratham abhiruhya uttaraṃ māṇavam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:805: yatredaṇīṃ nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro dīrgharātram acaṇḍo 'rabhaso 'karkaśa 'sāhasikaḥ keśagrahaṇam apy agamad iti viditvā nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:815: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaś ca ghaṭīkaraḥ ratham abhiruhya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:816: tayor yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:817: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:818: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:820: māṇavo na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:821: sādhv asya bhagavān tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathā uttaro māṇavo buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasīded iti;
V03vinv172u:822: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddha uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:823: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:824: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:827: svākhyātaṃ dharmavinayaṃ śrutvā na pravrajasi samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikām?
V03vinv172u:830: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena ca kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāmi;
V03vinv172u:831: pravraja tvaṃ somya nandīpāla mā vā;
V03vinv172u:833: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:834: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro māṇava ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv172u:835: taṃ bhagavān pravrājayatūpasaṃpādayatu anukaṃpām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:838: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:839_0: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaś aciraprakrāntaṃ nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ viditvā uttaraṃ
V03vinv172u:839_1: māṇavaṃ pravrājya upasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgyāṃ vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī
V03vinv172u:842: aśrauṣīt kṛkī rājā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kāśiṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve iti;
V03vinv172u:843: śrutvā ca punar vārāṇasyāḥ niṣkramya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:844: upasaṃkramya upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:845: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kṛkiṃ rājānaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:846: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:847: atha kṛkī rājā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kāśyapam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:848: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
V03vinv172u:849: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkino rājñas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:850: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāsyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:851: atha kṛkī rājā tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya (A 434b)
V03vinv172u:853: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv172u:854: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena kṛkeḥ rājño bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:855: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:856: atha kṛkī rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati;
V03vinv172u:857_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
V03vinv172u:857_1: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ
V03vinv172u:859: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:862: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:863: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:864: dvir api trir api kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:865: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:868: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:869: dvir api trir api kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kṛkiṃ rājānam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:870: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:871: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ saṃyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:872: asti kaścid bhagavan yo 'py evaṃrūpa upasthāyakaḥ tadyathā aham etarhy?
V03vinv172u:873: asti mahārāja tavaiva vijite vaibhiḍiṃgī nāma grāmanigamaḥ;
V03vinv172u:876: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:878_0: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo
V03vinv172u:878_1: nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatye āgataphalo 'bhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalaḥ sa na svahastaṃ
V03vinv172u:879: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvaikāntam upanikṣipyaivam āha:
V03vinv172u:880: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī bhavati sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu;
V03vinv172u:882: māṃ ca kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati; (SBV II 27)
V03vinv172u:883: ekam ahaṃ mahārāja samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya viharāmi;
V03vinv172u:884: so 'haṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam; (A 435a)
V03vinv172u:885: sāvādānaṃ vaibhiḍaṃgīṃ piṇḍāya caran yena ghaṭīkarasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:887: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ bahir nirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:890: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:894: praviśatu āryaḥ praviśatu bhadramukha ete kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:897: so 'haṃ mahārāja uttarakauravaṃ samayam adhiṣṭhāya svayam eva kuṇḍalikāyāḥ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikaṃ gṛhītvā bhuktavān;
V03vinv172u:899: adrākṣīn nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam;
V03vinv172u:900: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:901: amba tāta kenaite kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:904: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasyāśrauṣva argaḍakasyākoṭanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:906: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:907: sa evam āha: ahaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ piṇḍakenārthī;
V03vinv172u:913: tena te kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:915_0: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam
V03vinv172u:915_1: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ
V03vinv172u:915_2: cāsya satatasahagatā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na vijahāti;
V03vinv172u:917: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ yathā kuṇḍālikāyāḥ kulmāṣam. piṭhirikāyaś ca sūpikam evaṃ kuṇḍikāyā odanaṃ piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:919: samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya ahaṃ varṣā upagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:921: tena khalu samayena nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālā navatṛṇapraticchannā 'bhūt;
V03vinv172u:923: gacchata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālāṃ navatṛṇapraticchannām avacchādya mama vihāraṃ chādayata;
V03vinv172u:924: te mama om iti pratiśrutya nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayanti;
V03vinv172u:925: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro bahirnirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:929: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:930: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:931: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:932: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:933: tāv evam āhatuḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:934: tais tām avacchādya mama vihāraḥ praticchāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:935: paścād āgato nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro 'drākṣīn navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchāditāṃ;
V03vinv172u:936: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:937: amba tāta kenaiṣā navatṛṇapraticchannā āveśanaśālā avacchāditā;
V03vinv172u:939: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasya aśrauṣva navatṛṇapraticchannāyā āveśanaśālāyā avacchādanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:940: śrutvā ca punar evaṃ vadāvaḥ ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:941: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:942: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:943: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:944: tān āvām evaṃ vadāvaḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:947: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam (SBV II 29)
V03vinv172u:948: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ cāsya satatasamitā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na jahāti;
V03vinv172u:950: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ taṃ khalu varṣāvāsaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasyāveśanaśālā ekavāribindunāpi nābhivṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:951: yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena.
V03vinv172u:952: syāt khalu te mahārāja cetaso 'nyathātvam nādhivāsayati me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān?
V03vinv172u:953: na tv eva nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannāyām āveśanaśālāyām avacchāditāyāṃ cetaso 'nyathātvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:954: lābhā bhadanta nandīpālena ghaṭīkareṇa sulabdhā yasyāsya bhagavān kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam āpannaḥ.
V03vinv172u:955: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkeḥ rājñas taddānam anayābhyanumodanayābhyanumodate;
V03vinv172u:957: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
V03vinv172u:958: nakṣatrāṇāṃ mukhaṃ candra ādityas tapatāṃ mukham /
V03vinv172u:959: ūrdhvaṃ tiryag adhaś cāpi yāvatī jagato gatiḥ /
V03vinv172u:961: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkiṇaṃ rājānaṃ dharmyayā kathayā (A 436a)
V03vinv172u:963: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakam iti kṛtvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:964_0: atha kṛkī rājā kāsyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yāvat tāvat pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhya
V03vinv172u:964_1: kāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ trir pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tata eva pratinivṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:965: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā anyatamaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:966: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāma;
V03vinv172u:969: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāler anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:970: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:971: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:972: evaṃ deva iti sa puruṣaḥ kṛke rajñaḥ pratiśrutya parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālp ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:974: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāny anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:975: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:976: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:977: bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīya ity uktvā nādhivāsayati.
V03vinv172u:979: yo 'sau uttaro māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:980: yan mayā kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe kharaṃ vākkarma niścaritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:983: tasya karmaṇo vipākena etarhi mayā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:984: yadi punar bodhir apavaditābhaviṣyat punar api mayā triṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni ātmabodhinimittaṃ parikhedito 'bhaviṣyam;
V03vinv172u:985: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:989: yam eva divasaṃ bodhisatvo nirgatas tam eva divasaṃ yaśodharā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:990: yadā bodhisatvo duṣkarāṇi carati tadāntaḥpuram api duṣkaraṃ caritum ārabdhaṃ;
V03vinv172u:992: yadā bhagavān niṣkiṃcanaṃ duṣkaram iti viditvā yathāsukham āśvasiti;
V03vinv172u:995: sarpistailābhyāṃ gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati;
V03vinv172u:1001: tadāsau garbhaḥ punar api puṣṭiṃ gataḥ tasyā (SBV II 31)
V03vinv172u:1004: tvaṃ bodhisatve tapovanaṃ gate vyabhicaritā iti;
V03vinv172u:1013: tam eva divasaṃ rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1018: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ tad bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:1019: jāte kumāre bhūyasyā mātrayā śākyā vibruvate eva;
V03vinv172u:1020: tayāsau satyopayācanaṃ kṛtvā rāhulabhadro bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyāṃ sthāpayitvā krīḍāpuṣkariṇyām āplāvitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1021: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ plavatām iti;
V03vinv172u:1028: bhūyo 'pi bhavatāṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmi yathāyaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1030: yadā bhagavān atikrāntaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇy abhisaṃbuddhaḥ kapilavastv anuprāptaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuṃkte,
V03vinv172u:1033: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ bhagavantam anvāvarteyam it;
V03vinv172u:1034: kapilavastuni cānyatamā parivrājikā vaśīkaraṇādikarmasv atyarthaṃ pravīṇā;
V03vinv172u:1036: ārye kārṣāpaṇair vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā preṣaya iti;
V03vinv172u:1038: yaśodharayā rāhulasya haste datta uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:1039: putra yas tava pitā tasmai anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:1040: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1045: rāhulena sarvān buddhān pratyavekṣya bhagavato vṛddhānte sthitasya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1049: rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhaḥ nirvartyamāno 'pi na nirvartate:
V03vinv172u:1052: na śakyam anena gṛhavāse vastum (SBV II 32)
V03vinv172u:1053: iti; rāhulena bhagavataḥ pratyabhijñātena kṛtena rājā śuddhodanaḥ sāntaḥpurajanaḥ śākyāś ca paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ yaśodharāyāṃ cātyartham abhiprasannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1059: yadi rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro 'vaśyaṃ pravrājyate adyaikaṃ divasaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvad aham asya pūjāṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:1060: rājñā śuddhodanena rāhulasya mahān utsavaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1065: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ pravrājitaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1066: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1067: paśya bhadantāyuṣmatā rāhulena bhagavān modakena mahājanakāyasya madhye vijñāta iti;
V03vinv172u:1069: na bhikṣava etarhyi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anena rāhulena mālayā vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1072: The story of the great thief
V03vinv172u:1073: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:1075: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:1080: gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatarāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1085: tatas tasya patnyā śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā sa dārako hastabalena jñātibalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1088: sā tasya svaśilpād bhogasaṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1090: tasmin gate anayena vyasanam āpadyante iti;
V03vinv172u:1092: bhrāta imam api bhāgineyaṃ kuvindakarma śikṣayeti;
V03vinv172u:1099: sa kuvindaḥ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkte;
V03vinv172u:1101: mātula tvam api tad eva karma karoṣi;
V03vinv172u:1103: atha kasmāt tvaṃ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkṣe;
V03vinv172u:1109: mātula yady evam aham api cauryaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:1115: tena tatra śaśakaḥ krītvā tasya dattaḥ bhāgineya sādhaya tāvad yad ahaṃ snātvāgacchāmi;
V03vinv172u:1117: tena taṃ laghu laghv eva sādhayitvā ekapādo bhakṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1124: sa kathayati bhāgineyāsya caturthaḥ pādaḥ kva gataḥ?
V03vinv172u:1131: sa tam ādāya tripādakaṃ ca śaśakaṃ pānāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1143: śakyam anena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:1144: sa tena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1145: sa kuvindaḥ sandhau śiraḥ prakṣipati; tenocyate:
V03vinv172u:1146: mātula cauryam api na jñāyate tvayā kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:1152: tataś coraś cora iti kolāhalo jāta iti padbhyāṃ gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1155: sa śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1157: deva ekaś coraḥ sandhiṃ praviṣṭo gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1158: tasya ko 'pi śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1162: gacchata taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe tiṣṭhata;
V03vinv172u:1163: yas taṃ gṛhītvā roditi tenaikacoreṇa bhavitavyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:1165: tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe sthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1167: na nāma mayā mātulaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā roditavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1169: ātmānaṃ kṛtvā striyam api kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv172u:1170: puruṣam api vṛkṣam api aśvam api vṛṣabham api mahiṣam api chāgam api kukkuram api grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1171: yadā lokena vijñāta unmattako 'yam iti tadā taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1173: deva unmattakas taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrānta iti;
V03vinv172u:1176: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1180: iti; sa śākaṭikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā kāṣṭhasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1181: tasyopari śakaṭaṃ kāṣṭhapūrṇaṃ sthāpayitvā balīvardān utsṛjya śakaṭe agniṃ datvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1188: bhavanto yo 'sau śākaṭikaḥ sa evāsāv ekacorikaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1189: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1192: na nāma mayā mātulasya śmaśāne pitṛkāryaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:1193: sa brahmaṇaveṣaṃ kṛtvā adhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā taya tāṃ bhikṣāṃ śmaśāne paktvā piṇḍān datvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1195: deva brāhmaṇenādhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā yasmin pradeśe sa kabandho dagdhaḥ tatra paṃca piṇḍān datvā prakrānta iti;
V03vinv172u:1198: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv172u:1200: na nāma mayā mātulasyāsthīni gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāni?
V03vinv172u:1201: iti; sa kāpālikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1202: sa tatra gātraṃ bhasmanā uddhūlayitvā asthīnāṃ bhasmanāṃ ca karparakaṃ pūrayitvā gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1206: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1211: rājño duhitā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā tasmin jalodyāne sthāpitā;
V03vinv172u:1212: uktā ca yadi tvāṃ kaścid gṛhṇāti rāvayiṣyasi iti:
V03vinv172u:1214: yadaiṣā rāvayati tadā yuṣmābhir jalodyānaṃ gantavyaṃ;

V03vinv172u:1217: na nāma mayā rājaduhitryā sārdhaṃ paricārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1227: ārakṣakā riktapiṭharikā eta uhyante ity apy upekṣitā vyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1228: tato 'sāv ekacorikaḥ riktapiṭharikāyāṃ śiraḥ prakṣipya śrotasā uhyamānas taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1235: eṣa coro māṃ paricārya gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:1242: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1243: dārikā coreṇa sārdhaṃ paricārayitvā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:1244: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām (A 438a)
V03vinv172u:1249: na mayā putrasya janmani pramodaḥ kṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1250: sa kāṃcukīyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā rājakulān nirgamya pauruṣeyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:1251: bhavanto deva ājñāpayati pattanaṃ luṇṭhayata iti;
V03vinv172u:1262: rājyaṃ vā parityajāmi tasya vā nigrahaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:1265: ājñā dattā: bhavanta adhiṣṭhāne evaṃvidhaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata;
V03vinv172u:1266: yāvanto puruṣāḥ prativasanti taiḥ sarvair niṣparihārair bhūtvā maṇḍalavāṭaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1267: yo na praviśati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti;
V03vinv172u:1270: tato rājñā tasmai dārakāya mālāṃ datvā uktaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1271: yas tava pitā tasmai tāṃ mālām anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:1273: yasyāyaṃ dārako mālāṃ dadāti yuṣmābhir gṛhītvā matsakāśam upaneyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1274: tatas tāṃ puṣpamālāṃ gṛhītvā paribhramitum ārabdho janakāyān nirīkṣamāṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1286: tena tasmai sā duhitā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā;
V03vinv172u:1289: yo 'sāv ekacorika aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1290: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau rāhulas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1292: etarhy apy aham anena modakena vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1293: evaṃ hi vo bhikṣavo 'cintyaḥ satvānāṃ karmavipākaḥ iti karmaparāyaṇair bhavitavyaṃ.
V03vinv172u:1295: Yaśodharā seeks to bring the Buddha back to her
V03vinv172u:1297: yadi rāhulasya pitā antaḥpuraṃ praviśati tathāivānucaritavyo yathā na bhūyo nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:1298: tata ātmānam ādau kṛtvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhāni ṣaṣṭistrīsahasrāṇi nānāvidhālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtāni surabhimālyadhūpavastrair vibhūṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:1299: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vineyajanāpekṣā antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1304: etāḥ striyāḥ kāmarāgābhibhūtāḥ satyānām abhājanabhūtā (SBV II 37)
V03vinv172u:1308: viditvā pūrvasyāṃ diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:1309: tadyathā caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:1311: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhāny arcīṃṣi kāyān niścaranti;
V03vinv172u:1312: tadyathā nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni maṃjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
V03vinv172u:1318_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśy avaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham
V03vinv172u:1318_1: ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayan ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya
V03vinv172u:1319: atha tāḥ striyo bhagavata ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āvarjitā mūlanikṛntā iva drumā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya purastān niṣaṇṇāḥ dharmaśravaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:1320_0: tato bhagavatā tāsām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
V03vinv172u:1320_1: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhaiḥ ṣaṣṭistrīsahasraiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1321: yaśodharāyā atyarthaṃ kāmarāgābhibhūtāyā satyadarśanaṃ na kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1323: yannv ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvarteyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1324: viditvā svayam eva bhagavato 'rthāya annapānaṃ sādhayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1327: yaśodharā bhadanta bhagavantaṃ svahastaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayitukāma iti;
V03vinv172u:1329: pūrvam ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarāgaḥ sadveṣaḥ samohaḥ rasapratisaṃvedī rasarāgapratisaṃvedī ca;
V03vinv172u:1330: etarhy ahaṃ vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamoho rasapratisaṃvedī no tu rasarāgapratisaṃvedī;
V03vinv172u:1331: tat katham idānīṃ yaśodharā rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayati iti.
V03vinv172u:1332: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1335: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anayā modakenānvāvartitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1339: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatamasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane puṣpaphalasalilakandasaṃpanne riṣiḥ (A 439a)
V03vinv172u:1343: tasya vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvastavihāriṇo viharanti;
V03vinv172u:1351: prasavanakāle tam eva deśam āgamya prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:1353: sā gandhaṃ ghrātvā visabhāgaḥ satvaḥ iti saṃtrastā mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī chorayitvā prakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:1354: yāvad asau riṣis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1356: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kasyāyaṃ putraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1358: tena svāśramapadaṃ nītvā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1359: tasyāpi vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ śirasi mṛgaḍṛṅge prādurbhūte;
V03vinv172u:1360: tasya mṛgasya yādṛśe śṛṅge iti riṣyaśṛṇga iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:1364: yadā tasya maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā na cireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1366: putra asminn āśramapade nānādeśanivāsinaḥ riṣayaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmanti;
V03vinv172u:1367: te tvayā matpriyatayā svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa saṃmodya āsanenopanimantrayitavyā yathāśaktitaś ca phalamūlaiḥ pratipādyāḥ ity uktvā
V03vinv172u:1373: so 'pareṇa samayena salilārthī ghaṭam ādāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1378: tena pānīyastokaṃ gṛhītvā kṣipatā śāpo dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1380: tasmāt tvayā idaṃ divasam upādāya dvādaśavarṣāṇi na varṣitavyam (SBV II 39)
V03vinv172u:1385: bhavantaḥ kasyānubhāvād devo na varṣati iti;
V03vinv172u:1387: deva riṣiprakopād yady ayaṃ riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ cālayituṃ śakyeta,
V03vinv172u:1396: yady asau riṣis tasmāt tapasaś cālyate evaṃ devo varṣayati;
V03vinv172u:1399: kas taṃ śaknoti tasmāt tapaśaś cālayitum (A 439b)
V03vinv172u:1400: iti; tasya rājño duhitā śāntā nāma;
V03vinv172u:1403: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathāsau riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ calati iti;
V03vinv172u:1406: māṃ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhaya anyāṃś ca kanyāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1407: nausaṃkrame ca āśramapadaṃ kāraya puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam iti;
V03vinv172u:1408: tena brāhamṇakān mantrān pāṭhitā anyāś ca kanyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:1410: tataḥ tayā tāni phalāni vaśīkaraṇadravyaiḥ madyena ca samāpūritāni;
V03vinv172u:1411: aparāṇi ca nānāvicitrāṇi ca phalāni kāritāni;
V03vinv172u:1414: sā tābhiḥ kanyābhiḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhayantī āśramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:1415: riṣeḥ śiṣyair niveditam upādhyāya bahavas tavāśramapadaṃ riṣaya āgatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1419: vyāyāmahīnā ca gatiḥ salīlā mukhāni ca śmaśruvivarjitāni /
V03vinv172u:1420: urāṃsi caiṣāṃ viṣamonnatāni veṣo hy apūrvo 'yaṃ mahāriṣīnām* //
V03vinv172u:1421: iti; tena tā vicikitsāparyākulīkṛtamatināpi mūlaphalaiḥ pravāritāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1422: tābhis tāni phalāni paribhujya sa riṣir abhihito:
V03vinv172u:1424: asmākaṃ tv āśramo jalamadhye yatra phalāny amṛtaprakhyāni;
V03vinv172u:1425: api tu tvam asmābhir āśramapade upanimantrito bhava;
V03vinv172u:1429: tasya tatra madyapūrṇāni vaśīkaraṇadravyasaṃyuktāni nārikelaphalāni ca dattāni;
V03vinv172u:1430: sa madyamadākṣipto vaśīkaraṇadravyayogāt tayā sārdhaṃ vipratipannaḥ riddhiparihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1434: adyāpi tvam ātmānaṃ na jānīṣe ko 'ham iti;
V03vinv172u:1435: sa tayā rāgapāśapāśito rājñaḥ sakāsam unnītaḥ deva ayaṃ sa riṣiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1438: rājñā sā tasyaiva riṣer bhāryārthaṃ saparivārā dattā;
V03vinv172u:1439: sa śāntāṃ pratyākhyāya tābhir anyābhiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1440: tatra śāntā īrṣyākulīkṛtahṛdayā tasyāsatkāraṃ kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:1442: sa tayā sopānatkena pādena śirasi parāhataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1444: yo 'haṃ meghasyāpi garjitaṃ na sahe sa idānīṃ rāgapāśitaḥ strīmātreṇaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1445: tena vīryam āsthāya punar api paṃcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ.
V03vinv172u:1447: yo 'sāv ṛṣir aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1450: etarhy apy eṣā māṃ modakenānvāvartituṃ pravṛttā.
V03vinv172u:1453: yadā bhagavān antaḥpurān bhuktvā niṣkrāmati tadā yaśodharayā nairāśyam āpannayā bhartuḥ snehavaimukhyāc charaṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya ātmā muktaḥ; (A 440a)
V03vinv172u:1456: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1457: paśya bhadanta yaśodharayā bhagavanto 'rthāya śaraṇapṛṣṭhād ātmā muktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1459: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anayā mamārthāyātmā parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1462: The story of the Kinnara and the Kinnarī
V03vinv172u:1463: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva;
V03vinv172u:1466: tena tatra kinnaraḥ kinnarī ca dṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:1469: rajñā ākarṇaṃ dhanuḥ pūrayitvā kinnaraḥ śareṇa marmani tāḍitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1475: anujānīhi māṃ yāvad asya kinnarasya śarīrapūjāṃ kariṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1478: paśyāmi tāvat katham asya śarīrapūjāṃ karoti iti;
V03vinv172u:1480: tatas tayā taṃ kinnaraṃ kāṣṭhair avaṣṭabhya citāṃ prajvālyātmā prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1482: anyathā cintito py artha anyathā parivartitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:1485: yo 'sau kinnara aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1488: etarhy apy anayā mamārthāyātmā śaraṇapṛṣṭhān muktaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:1493_0: yad aham enāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttārayeyam iti viditvā tasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
V03vinv172u:1493_1: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā yaśodharayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
V03vinv172u:1494: sā samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitā;
V03vinv172u:1496: svakulasaṃśānurūpatayā āryamārgapratilambhāc ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ madhye samutpanneṣu kāryeṣv atyarthaṃ jihreti;
V03vinv172u:1498: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikānāṃ hrīmatīnāṃ yaduta yaśodharā rāhulamātā iti.
V03vinv172u:1499: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1501: kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā garbho dhāritaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1503: yaśodharayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātīṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:1505: The story of the two Ābhīrīs
V03vinv172u:1506: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin gokule dvau ābhīryau prativasataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1508: te abhikṣṇaṃ mathitaghaṭam ādāya grāmāntaṃ gacchataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1516: evaṃ tayāsau mātā ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā.
V03vinv172u:1518: yāsāv ābhīrīduhitā eṣā eva sā yaśodharā tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1519: yad anayā mātā śāṭhyasamudācāreṇa ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā,
V03vinv172u:1520: tasya karmaṇo vipākenānayā rāhulaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā ūḍhaḥ iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānām karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1521: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1522: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rāhulena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy avasthitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1524: rāhulenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:1525: rāhulena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:1526: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni na bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:1530: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:1531: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:1532: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (SBV II 43)
V03vinv172u:1535: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre puṣpaphalasaṃpannam āśramapadaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ viśvastamṛgapakṣiniṣevitam;
V03vinv172u:1536: tatra dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣāv ajinavalkaladhāriṇau śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1541: amuṣminn udyāne dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1542: tatra śaṅkha upādhyāyo likhitaś ca śiṣyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1543: yāvad apareṇa samayena śaṅkha udakasya kuṇḍikāṃ pūrayitvā mūlaphalānām arthe vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1544: likhitas tu sarātram evotthāya pūrvataraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1548: sa tṛṣṇārtaḥ saṃlakṣayati upādhyāyasantakaṃ pānīyaṃ pibāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1550: yāvat śaṅkha riṣir mūlaphalāny ādāya tṛṣāparyākulīkṛtamukhaḥ āśramaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1563: upādhyāya na śaknomy aham etat kaukṛtyaṃ prativinodayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:1564: prayaccha me gurukaṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
V03vinv172u:1568: yadi tvaṃ daṇḍenārthī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:1570: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā mṛgavadhāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1572: ahaṃ coro mahārāja yo 'syādattaṃ jalaṃ pibet /
V03vinv172u:1573: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate //
V03vinv172u:1576: api tu kasya santakaṃ tvayā jalam apahṛtaṃ?
V03vinv172u:1582: sa kathayati deva na śaknomy ahaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ (SBV II 44)
V03vinv172u:1584: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
V03vinv172u:1585: evam ukte rājā prakupitaḥ tīvreṇa paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1587: yady evam atraiva tiṣṭha na tāvat prayātavyaṃ yāvad ahaṃ pratinirvṛttaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1588: sa rājā mṛgavadhaṃ kṛtvā saṃcintyānyena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ na bhūyo nirgacchati;
V03vinv172u:1590: deva tasya riṣer adya ṣaḍdivasā( n)
V03vinv172u:1592: tasminn eva pradeśe tiṣṭhataḥ ājñāṃ dātum arhasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1597: ṛṣe deva kathayati uddhṛtadaṇḍo 'sau gacchatv eṣa evāsya daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1600: yo 'sau rājā brahmadatta eṣa eva sa rāhulaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1601: yad anena cittaṃ pradūṣya riṣir abhihitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1604: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy uṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1605: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1606: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1607: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena pradhānapuruṣāṇāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ?
V03vinv172u:1609: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:1611: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ( na)
V03vinv172u:1617: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:1618: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:1619: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:1621: Story of the beggar (concerning a previous birth of King Bhadrika)
V03vinv172u:1622: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ janapadād vārāṇasīm āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1627: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ samprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakonnādite vanaṣaṇḍe (A 441b)
V03vinv172u:1629: sa tatrāntaḥpureṇa sārdham udyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1630: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmaḥ puṣpaphalāni samanveṣamāṇaḥ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1631: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ nidrālasyaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1633: yāvad anyatamā strī saṃbhrāntā muktāhāraṃ chorayitvā prakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:1634: yāvad asau koṭṭamallakas tasminn udyāne paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1638: sthānam etad vidyate yad arthāyānarthaṃ prāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1640: yasya santako bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1642: deva amukayā udyāne muktāhāro vismṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1653: bhoḥ puruṣa kenaiṣa muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1657: rājā kathayati bhavantas taṃ koṭṭamallakaṃ śabdāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1660: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ bhoḥ puruṣa kasmāt tvayā muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthapitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1663: deva nāham asya bhāgī devasyaivārhati iti;
V03vinv172u:1666: vada kaṃ te varam anuprayacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1668: yadi devaḥ parituṣṭaḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā teṣāṃ pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya mām (SBV II 46)
V03vinv172u:1671: bhavanto yuṣmābhiḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya etaṃ puruṣaṃ teṣām adhipatiṃ sthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1673: devasamājñāpayati yāvantaḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ vārāṇasyāṃ sarvair amuṣminn udyāne saṃnipatitavyam;
V03vinv172u:1674: ahaṃ koṭṭamallakān bhojayāmi ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1675: te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ āmatyaiḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1680: te praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ vastrayugenācchāditāḥ prītamanasaḥ kathayanti yathā devaḥ samājñāpayati iti;
V03vinv172u:1682: prakṛtyaiva koṭṭamallakāḥ kṣutpipāsābhibhūtāḥ vīthyām annapānam ācchindanti;
V03vinv172u:1683: te rājñā satkṛtā iti bhūyasyā mātrayā ācchettum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1689: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pūpakān ādāya vīthīmadhyena gacchati;
V03vinv172u:1690: tena koṭṭamallakādhipatinā tasya sakāśāt pūpikā ācchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1691: sa tān ādāya pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1693: sa tair upadrūyamāno nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya anyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1694: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:1695: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho daivāt taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1698: nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yenāhaṃ mānuṣyam āsādya koṭṭamallako jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1699: yady ayaṃ mahātmā mamāntikāt pūpān pratigṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti;
V03vinv172u:1700: tatas tena pratyekabuddhena tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya parānugrahakāraṇāt pātram upanāmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1702: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:1703: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1706: drumaḥ pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1709: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyam eva na virāgayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1716: pratipādya kiṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:1720: vayam eva te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣāṃ tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1723: kiṃ tv asya riṣeḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:1724: tais tasya pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ vayaṃ te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣām ayaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati iti.
V03vinv172u:1726: yo 'sau koṭṭamallakādhipatir eṣa eva sa bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ iti tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1727: ye te koṭṭamallakā etāny eva tāni pañcaśākyaśatāni;
V03vinv172u:1729: tasya karmaṇo vipākena eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ śākyaśatānāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1730: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1734: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulāni pātrāṇy abhyavakāśa upari kṣiptāni;
V03vinv172u:1736: athānyatamo markataḥ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya yena pātrāṇi (A 442b)
V03vinv172u:1744: atha sa markaṭo yena bhagavataḥ pātraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1745: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pātram ādāya taṃ śālāvṛkṣam abhiruhya kṣaudrasya madhuno 'neḍakasya pūrayitvā śanair mandamandaṃ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya bhagavata upanāmayati;
V03vinv172u:1746: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti saprāṇakam iti kṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:1747: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya (SBV II 48)
V03vinv172u:1749: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti akalpikam iti kṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:1750: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya śītalena vāriṇā pariṣicya bhagavata upanāmayati;
V03vinv172u:1752_0: atha sa markaṭa pratigṛhītaṃ me bhagavatā madhupātram iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ
V03vinv172u:1752_1: udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalīkṛtaḥ pratipuṭakaṃ pratyavasṛto nartamānaḥ bhagavantaṃ
V03vinv172u:1752_2: namasyamānaḥ bhagavati prasādajāto bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayati;
V03vinv172u:1756: yam eva divasaṃ pratisandhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1760: yāvad asau brāhmaṇī aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:1762: yam eva divasaṃ jātas tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1763: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:1766: ayaṃ dārako yam eva divasaṃ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1767: yam api divasaṃ jātaḥ tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1769: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya madhuvāsiṣṭha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1771: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā svyākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1772: tasya pravrajitasyāpi sataḥ dine dine trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1776: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1777: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā madhuvāsiṣṭhena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākenāsya dine dine trīṇi pātrāṇi saṃpadyante iti;
V03vinv172u:1780: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ;
V03vinv172u:1781: dṛṣṭo yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa markaṭaḥ yena tathāgatasya madhupātram upanāmitaṃ? (A 443a)
V03vinv172u:1783: yo 'sau markaṭa eṣa evāsau madhuvāsiṣṭhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1785: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule upapannaḥ pratisandhau cāsya jātau ca madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1786: yāvad etarhy api divase divase trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1787: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1789: yadi madhuvāsiṣṭho bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudraṃ madhv adhimucyate;
V03vinv172u:1791: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti.
V03vinv172u:1792: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1793: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena rājenāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1795: upālinaiva bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1797: The story of the royal barber
V03vinv172u:1813: kuśalamūlāvaropaṇam asya kartavyam iti viditvā tasyānukampārtham upari vihāyasam (SBV II 50)
V03vinv172u:1816: sa mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1817: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathā me mātulo rājanāpitaḥ evam aham api rājanāpitaḥ syām iti.
V03vinv172u:1819: yo' sau rājanāpitasya bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv upālir bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:1820: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena rajanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1821: bhūyo 'pi yad anena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:1826: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:1827: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1828: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1829: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1835: mamātyayāt sarvaṃ svāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1836: sa tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭa uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:1838: kathayati: vayasya kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmi yasya me iyat dhanajātaṃ na putro na duhitā,
V03vinv172u:1839: mamātyayāt sarvam etad rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1841: yady evam eṣa mama sarvakanīyān putraḥ:
V03vinv172u:1845: te tasya putrāḥ yadā kenacit sārdhaṃ kaliṃ kurvanti tadā tena paribhāṣyante:
V03vinv172u:1846: yūyam api kaliṃ kurutha yeṣāṃ bhrātā nāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1848: yat kiṃcid vayaṃ paribhūtāḥ sarvaṃ tad asya bhrātur doṣāt;
V03vinv172u:1852: amukasya gṛhapateḥ putrāṇāṃ na kenacit śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1858: na kenacid eṣāṃ śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1866: te daurmanasyajātāḥ lokāpavādabhayāt taṃ ghātayitum icchanti;
V03vinv172u:1873: kāmam eva pravrajatu mā taiḥ prāṇān viyokṣyata iti viditvā uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1875: yat kiṃcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchethās tadā mamārocayiṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1879: mayā tasya pituḥ pratijñātam upadarśayiṣyāmi iti; gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:1880: tām imāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1881: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryaṃ yāvat mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ sa pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1882: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1883: bhūyo 'pi anena pañcasu pratyekabuddhaśateṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:1885: punar api caturṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1886: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūn vārān rājanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1887: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1888: kiṃ bhadanta upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1892: Upāli is the foremost among those who master and know the Vinaya
V03vinv172u:1893: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm (A 444a)
V03vinv172u:1897: bhikṣuḥ sa punaḥ kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1900: tad anena maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1901: yad mayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
V03vinv172u:1903_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo
V03vinv172u:1903_1: vyākṛto bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
V03vinv172u:1904: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:1905: yathā ca me upādhyāyena bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1906: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavāṃs śākyamunir vinayadharāṇām agraṃ nirdiṣed iti tatpraṇidhānavaśāt tathāgatena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1907: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1910: Untrue announcement of the death of the Buddha and the birth of Ānanda
V03vinv172u:1911: yadā bhagavatā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ papīyaṃsam abhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ,
V03vinv172u:1917: na bhagavān kālagato 'pi tu bhagavatānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam iti;
V03vinv172u:1918: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ param ānandam upāgataḥ;
