V03vinv172u:2188: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:2190: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:2193: tadyathā agniḥ prajvalito durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yadutārcirantarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2194: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2197: giriguhāgato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta daṃṣṭrāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2198: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2199: tadyathā rājño nāgo matto mātaṅgaḥ kuñjaraḥ ṣaṣṭihāyana īṣādanto vyūḍhoraskaḥ saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ saṃgrāmamadhyagato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta dantāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:2200: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2201: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ. (SBV II 62)
V03vinv172u:2202: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2203: yat khalu āyuṣman jānīyaḥ bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2206: tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2207: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:2210: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:2212: evam aham āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utasahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ sacen me bhagavān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2215: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:2216: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavān imān trīn varāṃ dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2217: evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ, nānyathā.
V03vinv172u:2218: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavata upasthāyakam utsāhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:2219: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:2220: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2221: utsāhita āvābhyaṃ bhadanta bhikṣur bhagavata upasthāyako yadutāyuṣmān ānanda; sa evam āha:
V03vinv172u:2222: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāṃs trīn varān dadyād evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:2225: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:2226: saced bhagavān imān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:2228: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2234: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2235: sa paśyaty anāgataṃ sabrahmacāriṇām antikād vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyaṃ dharmaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2238: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit*;
V03vinv172u:2239: sa kālaṃ jñāsyaty ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2241: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya upāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2243: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2246: maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit;
V03vinv172u:2247: sa kālaṃ jñāsyati ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2249: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyopāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:2251: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2254: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2255: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2257: evaṃ saṃjñāsyati tathāgataṃ sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthitaṃ nimittena vā parikathayā vā ādeṣṭum;
V03vinv172u:2258: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa bhagavān bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:2259: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa sugato bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:2260: yac ca yadā ādekṣyati tat sarvaṃ tathaiva bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv172u:2261: nānyathā; ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2265: yan maudgalyāyanānando bhikṣuḥ tathāgatam upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena, (SBV II 64)
V03vinv172u:2269: yadāyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām āyuṣmān ānando bhagavata upasthāyaka utsāhitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2271: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2272: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2278: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:2280: The story of Bhānumān and Bhānumantaḥ
V03vinv172u:2282: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhānur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:2283: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:2284: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2285: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:2289: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya bhānumān iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:2293: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2294: tasyāpi jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā bhānumanta iti nāma kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2296: sa pitaraṃ paśyati dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2298: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:2299: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:2300: sa pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2303: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante homā hūyante tapāṃsi tapyante tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2309: bhānumatā ṛṣimadhye pravrajitena ekānte prakramya anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:2311: sa itaś cānutaś ca paribhraman vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2314: sa ceha iti; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2318: ahaṃ te sarvopakaraṇair vaighātaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:2320: rājñā tasya bhānumantaḥ kumāraḥ upasthāyako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2338: sa pratyekabuddhaḥ svayam eva rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2341: pravrajyā śreyasi bhāno yasmāt saṃvarṇitā jinaiḥ // iti;
V03vinv172u:2349: anyathā cintitā hy arthā anyathā parivartitāḥ /
V03vinv172u:2350: alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāno paraṃ saptāham eva tu //
V03vinv172u:2356: sa ātmanaḥ alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā tīvreṇa prasādena tasyopasthānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2358: tasya pātraṃ karatale hṛhītvā bhuṃjānasya vāyunā hastaḥ kampate;
V03vinv172u:2359: tatas tena rājakumāreṇa kaṭakam avatārya pātrasya (A 449a)
V03vinv172u:2362: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2365: kuśalamūlena ye dharmasantāne praviśeyuḥ te niścalā avatiṣṭheyuḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2366: sa tasya pūrvaṃ parimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:2368: tvaṃ pūrvam āgārikabhūtaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padair vyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayasi;
V03vinv172u:2374: ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayanti iti;
V03vinv172u:2376: yo 'sau buddho bhagavān parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati,
V03vinv172u:2378: sa tena pratyekabuddhena pravrājitaḥ uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:2379: vatsa etad eva te manasi kartavyaṃ mayā saptāhasyātyayāt martavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:2380: tena tena saptāhena na kiṃcid adhigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:2382: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya bahuśrutaḥ syāṃ,
V03vinv172u:2385: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ pratyekabuddhasya bhrātā eṣa evāsāv ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:2386: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya bhrātur upasthānaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ upasthāyako bahuśrutaḥ śrutadharaḥ śrutasannicayaś ca.
V03vinv172u:2387: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2388: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavatā bahuśrutāṇāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti;
V03vinv172u:2390: ānandenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:2392: Ānanda is the foremost among the learned monks
V03vinv172u:2393: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:2399: yasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ bhagavatā kāśyapena bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2401: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
V03vinv172u:2403: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2404: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti;
V03vinv172u:2405: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:2406: yathā ca me upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena bahudhārāṇām (A 449b)
V03vinv172u:2408: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavān śākyamunir śākyādhirāja bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agraṃ vyākuryād;
V03vinv172u:2409: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:2411: ṛddhiḥ śāstā tṛkā vaktā caṇḍālenāyaṃ gayā /
V03vinv172u:2412: yasya caite parādhyanti satvaśrāṇāś ca kukkurāḥ // (SBV II 68)
V03vinv172u:2415: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
V03vinv172u:2418: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:2419: tatra ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddher lābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2421: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2423: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2425: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2427: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2430: Devadatta strives to win magical power
V03vinv172u:2431: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
V03vinv172u:2434: etarhi durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:2435: ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddhilābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2437: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2439: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2441: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2443: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2445: aham api yadi ṛddher lābhī syām aham api yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjīya;
V03vinv172u:2447: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2449: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2451: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2453: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:2455: atha ko nu me pratilabhaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti;
V03vinv172u:2457: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2459: vyapadiśatu me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti;
V03vinv172u:2460: atha bhagavān devadattasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannaṃ viditvā devadattam idam (SBV II 69)
V03vinv172u:2461: avocat: adhiśīle tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2463: anyac ca; adhicitte adhiprajñe tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru;
V03vinv172u:2466: na vyapadiśati me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2470: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinyo bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2471: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2474_0: sthaviro 'pi me kauṇḍinyo na vyapadiśati ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā āyuṣmān aśvajid
V03vinv172u:2474_1: bhadriko bāṣpo mahānāmā pūrṇo vimalo gavaṃpatiḥ subāhur yena paṃca sthaviraśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2477: atha paṃca sthaviraśatāni bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2478: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2480: anyac ca; vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2483: paṃcāpi sthaviraśatāni ṛddher mārgaṃ na vyapadiśanti;
V03vinv172u:2484: kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmadbhir bhagavatā sārdhaṃ purvam eva saṅgītaṃ bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:2485: tathā hi me na kaścid vyapadiśanti ṛddher mārgaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2487: atha ko nu me pratibalaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2489: Daśabalakāśyapa teaches to Devadatta the way to obtain magical power
V03vinv172u:2490: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
V03vinv172u:2492: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapo rāhagṛhe viharati senikāguhāyaṃ (A 450b)
V03vinv172u:2494: ayaṃ sthaviro daśabalakāśyapo dīrgharātram aśaṭha amāyāvī;
V03vinv172u:2495: ṛjukaṛjukajātīyo bhrātṛsālohitasya ca me nandasya upādhyāyo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:2496: pratibalaś ca me sthaviro daśabalakāśyapaḥ ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti viditvā yenāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapas tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2498: āyuṣmato daśabalakāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2499: ekāntasthito devadattaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ daśabalakāśyapam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2501_0: athāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ bhagavato mānasam avyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca
V03vinv172u:2501_1: bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam ity aviditvā ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadiśati;
V03vinv172u:2502: tatra devadattena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā;
V03vinv172u:2506: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe;
V03vinv172u:2509: ākāśe paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakunakaḥ imau vā sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
V03vinv172u:2511: kiṃ punar me yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2513: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2515: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2517: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān ca devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2519: ye vā te janapadā ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2524: kiṃ punar aham asmin magadhakṣetre pradhānapuruṣam anvāvartayeyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:2528: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2531: atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya (A 451a)
V03vinv172u:2533: dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2534: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;
V03vinv172u:2536: ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
V03vinv172u:2538: tad api devadatto 'bhyavaharati yathāpital lābhasatkāreṇa abhibhūtaḥ paryādattacittaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2539: tatrājātaśatruḥ kumāro bhūyasyā mātrayā pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratilabdhavān:
V03vinv172u:2540: mahardhikataro batāryo devadattaḥ śāstur antikāt* iti;
V03vinv172u:2542: paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2543: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2546: The gifts and honours of Ajātaśatru infatuate Devadatta and his magical powers leave him entirely
V03vinv172u:2547: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;
V03vinv172u:2548: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2550: rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2551: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2552: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72)
V03vinv172u:2554: śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrantāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2555: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2556: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:2557: iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;
V03vinv172u:2558: aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
V03vinv172u:2560: rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2561: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2562: devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:2563: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattasya lābhasatkāraṃ spṛhayata;
V03vinv172u:2567: tadyathā bhikṣavo vadhāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti parābhavāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2571: tadyathā vadhāya veṇur naḍaḥ phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2577: yāvac ca bhikṣavo devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāraḥ utpadyate,
V03vinv172u:2578: tat kasya bhaviṣyati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv172u:2579: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yal lābhasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2580: na ca na utpanno lābhasatkāraḥ cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2582: phalaṃ vai kadalīṃ hanti phalaṃ veṇuṃ phalaṃ naḍam* /
V03vinv172u:2585: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
V03vinv172u:2586: hanti bālasya śuklāṃsaṃ mūrdhno 'py asya nipātayat* //
V03vinv172u:2587: atha devadattasya lābhasatkārābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2588: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2589: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2591: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāram anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2592: sahacittotpādāt sa punar devadattas tasya ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2593: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:2595: Maudgalyāyana informs the Buddha as Devadatta is aiming at the direction of the congregation
V03vinv172u:2596: tena khalu samayena kakudo bhikṣuḥ kroḍaputro bhagavataḥ śrāvako bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā,
V03vinv172u:2599: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhārgaveṣu viharati śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:2600: atha kakudo brahmā devadattaṃ tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv172u:2601: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkucitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv172u:2602: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkucayed evam eva kakudo brahmā brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya purastād;
V03vinv172u:2603: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*;
V03vinv172u:2604: yat khalu bhadanta maudgalyāyana jānīyā devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2605: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum; aho (SBV II 74)
V03vinv172u:2608: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2609: sahacittotpādāt sa punas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2610: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:2613: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ vistareṇārocayeḥ anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv172u:2614: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kakudasya brahmaṇas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:2615: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2616: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ aciraprakrāntaṃ kakudaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2617: yathā samāhite citte bhārgeṣv antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:2619: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2620: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano yāvān evābhūt kakudena brahmaṇā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ vistareṇārocayati;
V03vinv172u:2621: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2622: na khalu maudgalyāyana devadattaḥ pūrvam eva cetasā spharitvā viditaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2623: kiṃ tataḥ paścāt kakudena brahmaṇā ārocitam?
V03vinv172u:2625: iyaṃ ca punar bhagavata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena sārdham antarākathā viprasṛtā.
V03vinv172u:2627: Devadatta visits the Buddha and departs indignant
V03vinv172u:2628: atha devadattaś catubhir bhikṣubhiḥ sahāyakaiḥ kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa samudradattena ca sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2629: adrākṣīd bhagavān devadattaṃ dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:2633: idānīṃ eṣa mohapuruṣo mama purastād ātmanaivātmānaṃ vyākariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:2635: pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2636: yathā samāhite citte veṇuvane 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve.
V03vinv172u:2638: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2640: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2641: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2644: śāriputramaudgalyāyanayos tāvad ahaṃ mohapuruṣa peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāriṇor api bhikṣusaṃghaṃ na pratinisṛjāmi;
V03vinv172u:2645: kutaḥ punas tvayi nisrakṣyāmi śave kheṭāśake?
V03vinv172u:2650: bhagavato 'ntike kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mānaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca āghātaṃ ca akṣāntiṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca prāviṣkārṣīt*;
V03vinv172u:2651: atha devadatto hum iti kṛtvā triḥ śiraḥ kampayitva bhagavato antikāt prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2654: The sermon on the five Teachers
V03vinv172u:2655: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2657: gacchānanda yāvanto veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya;
V03vinv172u:2658: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:2659: yāvanto bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2660: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2663: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti,
V03vinv172u:2668: upasaṃkramya purastāt bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2670: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ śāstāraḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānā loke;
V03vinv172u:2672: 1) ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2674: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2675: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2676: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2677: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2679: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ śīlavanto 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2680: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2681: ayaṃ prathamaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2682: 2) punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva pariśuddho me ajīvaḥ akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2684: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva san pariśuddho me ājīva asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2685: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2686: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2687: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2689: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ ājīvato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2690: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2691: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2693: apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2696: apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2697: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2698: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2699: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2701: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ jñānadarśanato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2702: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikād jñānadarśanānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2703: ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2704: 4) punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭam iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2706: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2707: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2708: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2709: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2711: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ saṃpannavyākaraṇo 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;

V03vinv172u:2993: yannv ahaṃ bhūyasyā matrayā saṃghabhedāya parākrameya iti;
V03vinv172u:2994: sa paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdham ante ārāmasya gaṇabhojanaṃ bhuṅkte;
V03vinv172u:3004: mā haiva pāpecchaḥ pudgalaḥ saṃgham evāgamya,
V03vinv172u:3006: saṃgham evāvedayitvā pāṣaṇḍika iva kṛtvā saṃghenaiva sārdhaṃ vigṛhya vivādaṃ sthāpayet iti.
V03vinv172u:3009: yadā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena devadattasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3011: kasmāt tvayā sthavira devadattasya pāpecchasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:3013: nāham āyuṣmanto jāne yathāyaṃ pāpeccha iti;
V03vinv172u:3014: yadi mayā jñātam abhaviṣyat ṛkāro 'py asya mayā na vyapadiṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat;
V03vinv172u:3019: na tvaṃ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmasi iti;
V03vinv172u:3021: apy eva nāmāyam asmābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmet;
V03vinv172u:3026: pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā iti;
V03vinv172u:3027: sa vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tayā akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:3028: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3029: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3032: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ akṛtajñatayā vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3035: The story of an out-caste versed in magic and of a brāhmaṇa student
V03vinv172u:3037: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca; (SBV II 87)
V03vinv172u:3038: tatra caṇḍālo vidyāmantradharo vidyāmantrakuśalaḥ gāndhārīvidyāṃ parivartya ṛddhyā gandhamādanāt parvatāt akālartukāni puṣpaphalāny ādāya rājñe brahmadattāyopanayati;
V03vinv172u:3040: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo mantrārthī mantragavaṣī śravaparampayā janapadāt vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3041: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tasya caṇḍālasya vidyāmantradhāriṇaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3043: icchāmy aham upādhyāyasya śuśrūṣāṃ kartuṃ; kasyārthe?
V03vinv172u:3045: na vidyā kasyacid deyā martavyaṃ saha vidyayā /
V03vinv172u:3046: prayacched vidyayā vidyāṃ śuśrūṣābhir dhanena vā // (iti)
V03vinv172u:3048: upādhyāya yady evam ahaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:3051: dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ śuśrūṣayā dīyeta vā na vā;
V03vinv172u:3053: tata ārādhanaparamaḥ satkṛtya guruśuśrūṣāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3054: yāvad apareṇa samayenāsau caṇḍālo madyamadākṣipto gṛham āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3063: yannv aham aṅgaṇikāyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ datvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3064: dharmatā hy eṣā śauṇḍānāṃ yo balavāṃs tasya vāntir bhavati;
V03vinv172u:3068: yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yad upādhyāyaḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pratibuddho na punaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayet;
V03vinv172u:3070: yāvad caṇḍālaḥ svayam eva pratibuddhaḥ paśyati taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3097: sa cātyarthaṃ vidyāmantradhārī akāmakaraṇīyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3099: tasya vṛttim ācchidya asmai māṇavāya dīyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:3102: tataḥ purohitena caṇḍālād vṛttim ācchidya tasmai brāhmaṇāya dattā;
V03vinv172u:3103: sa tayā akṛtajñatayā tasya vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:3104: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau caṇḍālaḥ eṣa evāsau daśabalakāśyapaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3105: so 'sau māṇavaḥ eṣa eva asau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3108: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3109: svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ prāg eva prabhūtataram;
V03vinv172u:3113: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3114: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gayām anuprāptaḥ gayāyāṃ viharati; (A 457a)
V03vinv172u:3115: rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni prāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:3117: paśya vṛddharājā śramaṇasya gautamasya kīdṛśān kārān karoti;
V03vinv172u:3119: asmākam api tvayā piṇḍakena avighātaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. (SBV II 89)
V03vinv172u:3121: devadattasyājātaśatruṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pratimārgaṃ preṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:3126: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3127: paśya bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur apātram apātravarṣī ca iti;
V03vinv172u:3131: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ apātram apātravarṣī;
V03vinv172u:3134: The story of a mango tree
V03vinv172u:3135: (concerning a previous birth of prince Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:3136: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane ṛṣīṇām āśramapadaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3141: yāvat tasminn āśramapade āmravṛkṣaḥ phalabhārāvanataśākhaḥ pakvaphalas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3143: yā tasmin vṛkṣe adhyuṣitā devatā sā mātsaryābhibhūtā na prayacchati;
V03vinv172u:3144: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ mūlārthinaḥ ekam ṛṣim āśramapade sthāpayitvā bhrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3145: tatsamanantaram eva paṃca coraśatāny āśramapadam anuprāptāni;
V03vinv172u:3150: vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā mūle chitvā phalāni bhakṣayata iti;
V03vinv172u:3151: evam ukte devatayā sarvāṇi phalāni bhūmyāṃ pātitāni;
V03vinv172u:3156: dadāti vṛkṣo na phalaṃ śāntānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ /
V03vinv172u:3157: dadāti tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ corāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇāṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:3162: mātsaryābhibhūtayā devatayā phalāni ṛṣīṇāṃ na dattāni;
V03vinv172u:3165: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yāsau devatā eṣa evāsav ajātaśatruḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3166: tadāpy eṣa ajātaśatruḥ devatābhūtaḥ apātram apātravarṣī ca;
V03vinv172u:3167: etarhi apy eṣa apātram apātravarṣī ca iti. (SBV II 90)
V03vinv172u:3170: atha bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:3171: devadatto rājagṛhanivāsino janakāyasya nityam evāparādhaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:3176: ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena rājagṛhe rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocaya yad devadatto vā,
V03vinv172u:3178: na tena buddho vā dharmo vā saṃgho vā saṃbadhyate iti;
V03vinv172u:3183: tena gatvā rājagṛhe nagararathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocitaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3184: te na bhūyo bhagavata upālambhaṃ preṣayanti.
V03vinv172u:3210: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3211: paśya bhadanta jīvakena bhagavataḥ saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātam iti;
V03vinv172u:3214: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3217: The story of a gṛhapati and his son
V03vinv172u:3222: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3223: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3224: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3226: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān jātāyāḥ jātimahaṃ kṛtvā valayeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3227: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3234: yady aham asyāḥ prabhūtān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:3235: sthānam etad vidyate yat parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ vikariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:3236: yannv aham asyāḥ svalpān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3239: grīvāyāṃ muktāhāraṃ baddhvā śmaśāne aśvakarṇasya mūle nikhanya paṇyam ādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3243: tatas tayā pūrvikayā patnyā valayā sa ca dārakaḥ hastabalena jñātibalena ca pāyitau,
V03vinv172u:3249: putra asmin deśe amukam adhiṣṭhānaṃ tatra tiṣṭhati (A 458a)
V03vinv172u:3251: gaccha yadi kiṃcid asyojjīvanopāyas te bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:3252: sa pitaraṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ anupūrveṇa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3253: sa vīthyām anvāhiṇḍamānaḥ pitrā mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3263: sa tasyātyarthaṃ snehaṃ kartuṃ ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 92)
V03vinv172u:3269: yathāyam asyātyarthaṃ snehavān nūnam asyaiva putraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3276: sthānam etad vidyate yad enaṃ praghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:3277: yadi ca kiṃcid dāsyāmi antarmārge dāyādyakāraṇād ghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:3278: yannv aham evaṃ preṣayeyam iti viditvā cīrikā likhitvā dattā:
V03vinv172u:3280: tasmin khanan vai nipuṇo 'pramatto dāyādyam ātmīyam upaiṣyasi tvaṃ //
V03vinv172u:3281: kaṇṭhe tu yat tad valayāyā deyam iti.
V03vinv172u:3284: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdhaṃ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3292: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdham iti;
V03vinv172u:3303: sa tāṃ cīrikāṃ vācayitum ārabdhaḥ: grāmeti,
V03vinv172u:3314: sa evaṃ gāthārthaṃ vicārya niḥsaṃpātavelāyāṃ śmaśānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3317: sa tasya pūrve digbhāge yugamātraṃ māpayitvā khanitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3320: sa tam ādāya āttamanāttamano gṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3323: yo 'sau gṛhapatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3324: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau jīvakaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3325: tadāpy anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ.
V03vinv172u:3327: The sichness of the Buddha. The Buddha heals Devadatta
V03vinv172u:3330: na śakyam atyalpena ghṛtena cikitsāṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3331: tena pātraṃ gṛhītvā dvātriṃśad ghṛtapalāni tulonmitāni kṛtvā bhagavate pradattāni;
V03vinv172u:3338: jīvaka kiyati mātrā ghṛtasya śramaṇena gautamena pītā?
V03vinv172u:3342: aham api dvātriṃśat palāni pibāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3346: tvaṃ punar na śakṣyasi jarayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:3350: iti; tena dvātriṃśatpalikā mātrā balāt pītā;
V03vinv172u:3353: aparasminn eva divase jīvakena bhagavato maṇḍo dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3354: devadattena mānād bhagavān pibatīti ajīrṇe eva ghṛte maṇḍaḥ pītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3357: sa tannimittaṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām (SBV II 94)
V03vinv172u:3359: na rātrau na divā nidrām āsādayati.
V03vinv172u:3362_0: tato bhagavatā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ bhitvā caktasvastikanandyāvartena
V03vinv172u:3362_1: anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakaraṃ karaṃ devadattasya sthāpayitvā satyopayācanaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3363: yena satyena yathā rāhulabhadre priye ekaputrake cittam anūnānadhikaṃ tathaiva devadatte tena satyena rujā śamaṃ gacched iti;
V03vinv172u:3374: devadatto bhagavatā satyopayācanayā pragāḍhavedanābhibhūtaḥ prāṇair viyujyamānaḥ svasthīkṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3375: yaṃ śrutvā devadattapakṣyā apy atyantābhiniviṣṭā bhagavaty āścaryaṃ praveditavantaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3393: upasaṃkramya saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3401: dvau ṛkṣau śibirājā ca vidārā jujjukena ca //
V03vinv172u:3403: The story of a Sage and of an ungrateful elephant
V03vinv172u:3405: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane nānāvidhapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam udyānaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3411: sā bhītā trastā kalabhaṃ parityajya mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī niṣpalāyitā;
V03vinv172u:3412: yāvad asau ṛṣir āśramapadān niṣkramya āśramapadasāmantakena diśo vyavalokayan saṃparibhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3414: tato 'sau ṛṣiḥ kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tanmātṛsamanveṣaṇābhiniviṣṭabuddhiḥ samantato vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3415: yadā sarvāvasthaṃ na paśyati tadā tam ādāyāśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3416: sa tena putravad āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3424: sa yadā saṃjātarāgaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tadā santarjyamāno 'py avajñāṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:3425: yāvad apareṇa samayena ṛṣiṇā bhṛśaṃ tarjitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3429: na saṃgatiḥ kāpuruṣeṇa bhadrika kṛtaghnasatvena sudāruṇena /
V03vinv172u:3430: cirānuyāto 'pi karoti pāpikaṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3431: kim ādarād durjanaṃ sevase tvam annena pānena tathobhayena /
V03vinv172u:3432: avaśyam ante sa nihanti mitraṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3435: yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3436: yo 'sau hastināgaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3444: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mahendrasena nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3446: yat kiṃcit svapne paśyati sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhavati;
V03vinv172u:3447: tasya ca rājño vijite suvarṇapārśvo nāma bodhisatvaḥ mṛgeṣūpapanno mṛgāṇām adhipatiḥ;
V03vinv172u:3450: yas taṃ paśyati sa nirīkṣamānas tatraiva tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3452: sa lubdhakabhayād anyalokabhayāc ca bhītaś carati;
V03vinv172u:3453: dharmatā hy eṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco 'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3457: bho mātula kasmāt tvam evaṃ bhītabhītaś carasi?
V03vinv172u:3459: bhāgineya mamedaṃ rūpaṃ sarvalokaśubhaṃ saṃprārthanīyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3460: so 'haṃ lokabhayāl lubdhakabhayāc ca bhītabhītaś (SBV II 97)
V03vinv172u:3467: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣo dviṣadbhiḥ paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho navāmbupūrṇāyāṃ hemalohyāṃ hemamālinyāṃ śīghrasrotasi nadyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3470: bhavāmi kasya dāso 'haṃ kasya vā paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3471: yo me 'dya jīvitaṃ dadyād yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti;
V03vinv172u:3472: daivād asau mṛgādhipatiḥ salilāśayāt mṛgagaṇaparivṛto nadīsamīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3473: tataḥ puruṣavirāvaṃ śrutvā te mṛgāḥ samantād vidrutāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3474: dharmatā hy eṣā bodhisatvānāṃ yad api kāyena vinipatanti,
V03vinv172u:3476: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatiḥ kāruṇyād āmreḍitahṛdayaḥ sahasā nadīm avatartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3477: kākaś cāsya pūrvamaryādāvadhṛtamatiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anubaddha eva saṃrakṣaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:3478: sa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtoddharaṇavyavasāyaṃ viditvā evam āha:
V03vinv172u:3481: akṛtajñā hy ete manuṣyāḥ nopakāraṃ manyante iti;
V03vinv172u:3483: sa tasya vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā nadīm avagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ priyam ivaikaputraṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya,
V03vinv172u:3487: kathayati: vatsa anena pathā yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:3488: tato 'sau puruṣaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādayor nipatya taṃ mṛgādhipatim idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:3489: tava dāso hy ahaṃ tāta tavaiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3490: tvayā me jīvitaṃ dattaṃ yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti
V03vinv172u:3492: ma me tvam adya dāsaḥ syāḥ mā caiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3493: na vācyas tv aham anyebhyo hanyur māṃ carmakāraṇāt //
V03vinv172u:3494: api tu vatsa idaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3495: kṛte pratyupakārāt nāhaṃ tvayā kasyacin nivedyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3496: atilobhanīyam idaṃ me śarīraṃ prārthanīyaṃ sarvalokasya iti;
V03vinv172u:3497: tatas sa puruṣa tatheti pratijñāya mṛgādhipatiṃ (SBV II 98)
V03vinv172u:3499_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena candraprabhā devī ratiparikhedakhinnā mahāśayane atyarthaṃ
V03vinv172u:3499_1: middham avakrāntā rātryāḥ paścime yāme svapnam adrākṣīd atiparamaramaṇīyaśarīraṃ
V03vinv172u:3499_2: mṛgādhipatiṃ siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3500: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyakṣavat svapnadarśanasaṃjanitasaumanasyā laghu laghv eva mahāśayanād utthāya rājño niveditavatī;
V03vinv172u:3501: śrutvā rājā tasyāḥ satyasvapnāyāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3502: aniṣṭagatyupapannena satā kathaṃ nāma siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmo deśayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3503: tataś candraprabhā devī priyamadhuracāturyakathāsamudācārayogena muhūrtaṃ rājānam upalāḍya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3504: deva kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ tasya mṛgasyānayanāya iti;
V03vinv172u:3506: ājñā dattā: bhavanto yāvanto madviṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakās tiṣṭhanti te sarve matsakāśam upaneyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3508: devaḥ samājñāpayati madviṣayanivāsibhir mṛgalubdhakair ihāgantavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3509: tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvamṛgalubdhakā iha preṣayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3510: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ preṣitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3513: bhavanto śrutaṃ mayā madvijite paramaramaṇīyarūpavigraho mṛgo 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:3514: sa yuṣmābhir mṛduśithilabandhanopanibaddho matsakāśam akhedita upaneyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3517: iyatā kālena devasya vijite paryaṭadbhir na kadācid evaṃvidho mṛgavaraḥ śrutapūrvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3518: kimuta dṛṣṭaḥ tam arhati devaḥ śravaparamparayā samanveṣya amuṣmin deśe tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv172u:3520: evaṃ devasya vayaṃ niyatam ājñāṃ saṃpādayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3522: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata samājñāpayati devaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3524: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3526: amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:3527: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgatāś ca janāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3528: deva evaṃ samājñāpayati madvijite atiparamaramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir asti;
V03vinv172u:3529: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3535: nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa kāmanidānotthena dveṣavahnitīvreṇa santāpitahṛdayaḥ saṃlakṣayti:
V03vinv172u:3538: kiṃ mayā punas tādṛśī avasthā prāpayitavyā?
V03vinv172u:3540: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rājñaḥ parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇasya rājakāryam adhitiṣṭhataḥ,
V03vinv172u:3541: anivārite rājakuladvāre nānāvicitrasurabhipuṣpāṇy ādāya dauvārikāmātyaparaṃparayā rājānaṃ saṃśrāvya parṣadam abhyavagāhya satkāravidhipūrvakeṇa rājño niveditayati:
V03vinv172u:3542: amuṣmin deśe nānātaruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite viśvastamṛgapakṣiṇi suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir anekamṛgagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3543: ahaṃ taṃ devasya atiramaṇīyavigrahaṃ mṛgavaram upadarśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3544: tato rājā tacchravaṇasaṃjanitasaumanasyaḥ anekāmātyaśatasahasraparivṛtaḥ kutūhalajātenānyena nānādeśābhyāgatena vārāṇasīnivāsinā ca paurajānapadena saṃpuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3547: yāvad asau kākaḥ bodhisatvasya kṛtāvadhiḥ diśām avalokakaḥ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍavṛkṣaśikhare niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3551: mṛgarāja mayā tvaṃ pūrvam uktaḥ akṛtajñā manuṣyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:3554: ayaṃ sa puruṣo mahatā prābhṛtenāgataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3559: kāmaṃ svaprāṇavināśo na tu satvādhyupekṣaṇam iti viditvā rājānaṃ pratyudgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3560: tataḥ sa puruṣo nirghṛṇahṛdayas tyaktaparaloko mṛgadarśanād āvarjitamatis taṃ mṛgavaram ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām upadarśayann āha:
V03vinv172u:3562: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi na vipākakālam apekṣante;
V03vinv172u:3563: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tasya puruṣasya ubhau pāṇī pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:3564: tataḥ sa rājā saṃvegajātas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān:
V03vinv172u:3566: iti; sa duḥkhavedanābhyāhataḥ sagadgadaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3567: nāsau coro mahārāja haraty arthaṃ nihatya yaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3568: sa tu coro mahārāja yasya nāsti kṛtajñatā // (SBV II 100)
V03vinv172u:3577: tato rājā bodhisatvasya tāṃ prabhāvamahattāṃ jñātvā amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3582: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭādāmakalāpaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3586: tato rājñā asāv atiramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir mahatyā vibhūtyā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ praveśya siṃhāsane niṣāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3587: tato mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena rājā sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadais parivārya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3588: atha mṛgādhipatibodhisatvena samantāt tāṃ parṣadam avalokya rājñas tasyāś ca parṣadas tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3589: yaṃ śrutvā rājñā saparivāreṇa paṃcaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni;
V03vinv172u:3594: yo 'sau suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3595: yo 'sau puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3598: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3600: The story of a lord of monkeys and of a maker of garlands
V03vinv172u:3604: sa divā divasam eva nadīpuṣpāṇy (SBV II 101)
V03vinv172u:3605: uccinoti; yāvad apareṇa samayena nadīm uttaratā āmraphalam uhyamānam anārtavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3612: deva īdṛśāny āmraphalāni dātum arhasi iti;
V03vinv172u:3630: tena pūrvakāmraphalānusāreṇa sambalam ādāya gacchatā parvataikadeśe sa āmravṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3633: tataḥ sa mālākāras taṃ vṛkṣam itaś cāmutaś ca nirīkṣate samdhiroḍhuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3635: tasy tatra āmraphalāśayād bahavo divasā atikrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3639: yathā vā tathā vā adhiruhāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3640: sa pāṣāṇan avalambya avalambya adhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3642: tasmiṃś ca parvate vānarabhūto bodhisatvo vānarāṇām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3643: daivād asau tasmin parvate yūtham apahāya taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3645: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3646: sa tasya hitādhānatatparatayā na śakyate kramam antareṇa uddhartum iti pāṣāṇair abhyāsaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3647: yadāsya parividitaḥ śaknomy aham enam uddhartum iti tadā sa tena prapātāt krameṇoddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3648: pāṣāṇavyāyāmāt tasya ca mālākārasyoddharaṇād atīva pariśrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3656: anikṣiptotsāhaḥ sa mahātmā parahitādhānatatparaḥ pariśrānto 'pi taṃ vṛkṣam adhiruhya āmraphalāni pātayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3669: kṣīṇapathyadano 'haṃ yady āmraphalaṃ bhakṣayan gamiṣyāmi rājñaḥ kiṃ mayā deyaṃ? (A 461b)
V03vinv172u:3670: tasmād etam eva vānaraṃ hatvā śuṇḍīvallūrakāṇi kṛtvā mārgaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3671: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena mahatyā śilayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3674: ekatyās tu manuṣyāḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ na jānanti //
V03vinv172u:3676: yo 'sau markaṭādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3677: yo 'sau mālākaraḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3680: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3682: The story of a lord of a dārukoṭaka bird and a lion
V03vinv172u:3684: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane parvatagiriguhāpravaṇe puṣpaphalasamṛddhe pakṣiṣūpapanno dārukoṭako babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3685: tasminn eva ca parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgarājaḥ yatheṣṭapracāravihāratayā mṛgān praghātya praghātya bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:3686: tasyāpareṇa samayena māṃsaṃ bhakṣayataḥ asthi dantāntareṇa praviṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3690: daivāt sa dārukoṭako vṛkṣāntarasañcārābhyāsād yasmin pradeśe mṛgādhipatis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3691: tena asau siṃho duḥkhavedanābhyāhato dṛṣṭaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:3702: tat tvayā mama kālena kālaṃ yogodvahanaṃ kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3707: tathāsya cikitsāṃ karomi yathā kṛtam api na jānīte;
V03vinv172u:3710: yāvad asau mṛgādhipatiḥ sukhavāyusaṃsparśaviṣkambhitāsyo mahatyāṃ pṛthivīśilāyāṃ vāmapārśvaṃ śirasy ādhāya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3711: tato 'sau dārukoṭakas tasya mṛgādhipates samīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3715: iti viditvā suparīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā dantānataravilagnam asthi pakṣanipātakrameṇa sahasā apakṛṣya mukhavivarān niṣkramya tam eva nirīkṣamāṇo vṛkṣe 'vasthitaḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3716: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatir asthiśalyāpahārasaṃjanitasaumanasyo nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3717: athāsau dārukoṭakaḥ taṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ vyapagataduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ viditvā pramuditamanās tatsamīpam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3718: mātula idaṃ tad asthi tava duḥkhanimittabhūtam iti;
V03vinv172u:3719: tato 'sau mṛgādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3720: bhāgineya asyopakārasya mayā tavāvaśyaṃ pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkramethāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3721: śobhanam eva tathā bhavatu ity uktvā sa dārukoṭakaḥ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3724: sa ca dārukoṭakaḥ śyenakasya pakṣiṇaḥ kramāntaraparibhraṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3725: mṛtam iva ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṣudhāparigatahṛdayaḥ tasya mṛgādhipateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ ārtinivedanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3731: daṃṣṭrāntarālasaktas tvaṃ jīvan na bahumanyase // iti
V03vinv172u:3734: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti
V03vinv172u:3737: yo 'sau dārukoṭakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3738: yo 'sau siṃho mṛgarājaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3741: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3743: The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man
V03vinv172u:3745: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3747: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3749: tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:3753: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3758: sa jātaśaṅko 'pi sādhvasān na śaknoti gantuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3759: tatas tena ṛkṣeṇa bāhubhyām upagṛhya dhāritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3764: saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3771: api tu mayā tava pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3774: yathā māṃ na kasyacin nivedayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:3777: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayor nipatya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3784: tvaṃ kilākālasāptāhikameghena śvāpadena vā praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3789: vayasya kāmaṃ yena vā tena vā jīvikaṃ kalpayāmi,
V03vinv172u:3791: sa tena tathā tathā pratilobhito māṃsapratyaṃśadvayena yathā pratipanno mārgam upadarśayan saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3793: guhām anuprāptaḥ yatrāsau mahātmā ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3794: tato nairghṛṇyam āsthāya akṛtajñatāṃ ca kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3796: tatas tena lubdhena paraprāṇoparodhinā guhāyām agnir dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3797: atha sa mahātmā ṛkṣo dhūmavyākulīkṛtamanā aśruparyākuleṣaṇo gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3798: kasya kiṃ vyapanītaṃ me vasatā girigahvare /
V03vinv172u:3803: tatas tair viśasyamāṃsasya bhāgān kṛtvā sa kṛtaghnapuruṣo 'bhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3807: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hā kaṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭam ity uktvā svakān api pratyaṃśān parityajya prakrāntam;
V03vinv172u:3808: etad atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyas tasmin pradeśe sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3811: tato rājā brahmadattas tasya carma gṛhītva vismayotphullalocanaḥ (SBV II 106)
V03vinv172u:3812: etam arthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāya nivedayāmīti taṃ saṃghārāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3813: carma puṣkariṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃghasyaitam arthaṃ vistareṇa rocayati;
V03vinv172u:3817: pūjanīyas tribhir lokaiḥ tvayāpy eṣa narottama // iti
V03vinv172u:3823: tato rājā brahmadattaḥ sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhāny ādāya taṃ pradeśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3824: sarvaṃ tan māṃsam asthi kalebaraṃ ca ekadhye kārayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3825: bhavantaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:3826: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3829: yaiś ca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ te sarve mokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ.
V03vinv172u:3831: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3832: yo 'sāv akṛtajñaḥ puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3835: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3837: Another story of a bear of a poor man
V03vinv172u:3839: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3841: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3842: tatparvatapradeśe vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhe aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ ṛkṣeṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3843: yāvad asau kāṣṭhahārakaḥ kāṣṭhāni paryeṣamāṇaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe vyāghreṇābhidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3845: vṛkṣam abhirūḍho yasminvṛkṣe sa ṛkṣo bodhisatvas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3848: sa ca vyāghra āhāragṛddhas taṃ vṛkṣatalaṃ naiva muñcati;
V03vinv172u:3850: ca: bho mahātmann ete manuṣyāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ akṛtajñāḥ bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3858: tathāpy asau vyāghraḥ māṃsaśoṇitābhilāṣī tiṣṭhaty eva;
V03vinv172u:3863: sa tasyotsaṅganiṣaṇṇaḥ śramakheditapariṣrāntaś ca middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3865: bhoḥ puruṣa kiyantaṃ kālaṃ tvayātra sthātavyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3868: iti; sa nirghṛṇahṛdayaḥ pāpakarmā tyaktaparalokaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3873: tena mahātmanā patatābhihitaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi ity uktvā patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3875: sa tasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3880: hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3883: te vidyāmantradhāriṇo bhūtacikitsakān anyāṃś ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān pṛcchati;
V03vinv172u:3886: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre āśramapade vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne anekavihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3887: tasya puruṣasya jñātayas taṃ puruṣan ādāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3892: anena durātmanā kṛtopakārī bodhisatvo vyāghrasya purastāt pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3893: tena mahātmanā cintitam asmai dharmaṃ deśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3895: tasya patato bhrāntasya daśānāṃ ślokānām ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratibhātaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3897: kathayati: upādhyāya kathayasva tāvat kīdṛśas te ślokāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3898: sa ṛṣir anupūrveṇa tān ślokān kathayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3899: hā kāṣṭaṃ bata loke 'smin adharmaḥ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3900: asaty eṣu manuṣyeṣu hiṃsā mitreṣu vidyate // 1 //
V03vinv172u:3901: naivāsane na śayane nāpi caiva ca caṅkrame /
V03vinv172u:3902: na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ mitradruk sukham edhate // 2 //
V03vinv172u:3903: vāṇī te karuṇārttena tatā yā caiva bhāṣitā /
V03vinv172u:3904: sā tvāṃ dahati durbuddhe khāṇḍavaṃ jvalitaṃ yathā // 3 //
V03vinv172u:3905: tena hi tvaṃ pare loke 'nubhaviṣyasi vedanām //
V03vinv172u:3907: hā heti krandamānas tvaṃ raurave bhṛśadāruṇe /
V03vinv172u:3909: kiṃ te na prakṛtaṃ karma raudrasyāśubhakarmaṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3913: smara ṛkṣaṃ ca vyāghraṃ ca yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ tvayā // 7 //
V03vinv172u:3914: durbuddhe tvaṃ na jānīṣe yathā mitreṣu vartitum /
V03vinv172u:3915: hantāraṃ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati // 8 //
V03vinv172u:3916: sevitas tvaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ prāpte vyāghramahābhaye /
V03vinv172u:3917: rakṣitaś ca śayānas tvaṃ tvayāsau kiṃ na rakṣitaḥ // 9 //
V03vinv172u:3921: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3922: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥ satvaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3925: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3927: The story of the king Śibi
V03vinv172u:3929: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ (SBV II 109)
V03vinv172u:3931: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgi nissaṅgaparityāgī mahati ca tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:3932: tasya nāsti kiṃcid adattam aparityaktaṃ yaduta śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo vaṇīpakebhyaḥ adhvagebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3933: yadbhūyasā tu glānebhyaḥ ācaritaṃ tasya rājñaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3934: kālyam evotthāya mātāpitarāv abhivādya glānāvalokyanaṃ kṛtvā arthādhikaraṇe niṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:3936: sa sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto nirapekṣo jīvite maraṇābhimuktaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ śibighoṣāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3937_0: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukākokilajīvañjīvonnādite
V03vinv172u:3938: sa ca vyādhitas tīvrarujopatāpasaṅjanitadaurmanasyo muhuḥ śvāsoparudhhyamānatanur aśruparyākulekaṇo daṇḍapāṇiḥ śanaiḥ śanai rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3942: tataḥ śibirājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tatra eva pratinivṛttaḥ amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3946: tato rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ śabdayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3949: deva yaḥ puruṣaḥ janmano na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ tasya rudhireṇa yavāgūṃ sādhayitvā yadi bhojyate,
V03vinv172u:3955: īdṛśena yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śaknomi śāntiṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:3956: evaṃ vicintya rājā svasantatiṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3960: tvaṃ mamāṃsagatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:3963: putra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā,
V03vinv172u:3971: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3972: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3973: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3979: kathaṃ nāma ekasya prākṛtasatvasyārthāya iyantaḥ satvāḥ parityajyante?
V03vinv172u:3980: iti; tato rājñā sa janakāyaḥ samāśvāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3981: tad anenopāyena ṣaṇ māsān paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3991: tadā śibinā rājñā paṃcabhir grāmavaraiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3994: śibinā rājñā paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3995: svarudhireṇa glānasya iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3997: tataḥ kutūhalajātaḥ satvā āgamya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv172u:3998: bhoḥ puruṣa satyaṃ tava kila śibinā rājñā iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtam?
V03vinv172u:4001: duṣṭaśoṇitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā choryeta anyasya vā dīyeta,
V03vinv172u:4004: yenāsya gṛhaṃ sarvaṃ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ.
V03vinv172u:4006: yo 'sau śibī rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4007: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥpuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4010: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:4014: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:4015: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4018: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4019: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāso (A 464b)
V03vinv172u:4022: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:4026: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalyāṇakārīti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:4029: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4030: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:4031: bhūyaḥ sa rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4032: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4033: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4038: kalyāṇakārī kumāro maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatveṣu dayāvān dānarucir dānābhirataḥ;
V03vinv172u:4041: putra mā tvaṃ satataṃ dānam anuprayaccha;
V03vinv172u:4042: kuto 'smākam etāvad dhanajātaṃ bhaviṣyati yannv aham anvaham evaṃ dāsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:4043: dharmatā hy eṣā dātur dānapater yad bahujanasya priyo bhavati manāpaś ca;
V03vinv172u:4045: tasyānyatareṇa bhūmyantareṇa rājñā guṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:4057: yadi mahāsamudrāt samṛddhayānapātro 'bhyāgacchati bhūyasā bahujanapriyo bhavati (SBV II 112)
V03vinv172u:4058: manāpaś ca; sthānam etad vidyate yat tiṣṭhata eva pituḥ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:4063: iti viditvā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4065: aham api tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4070: yo yuṣmākam utsahate kalyāṇakāriṇā sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkena agulmena atarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartuṃ (A 465a)
V03vinv172u:4073_0: tataḥ kalyāṇakārī sārthavāhaḥ akalyāṇakāriṇā bhrātrā sārdhaṃ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ
V03vinv172u:4073_1: anekavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ
V03vinv172u:4074: so 'nupūrveṇa grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu paṭṭanāny avalokya samudratīram anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4075: sa paṃcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ kṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhārakaṃ nirhārakaṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4082: yāvat tad vahanam anuguṇena vāyunā ratnadvīpam anuprāptaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4085: yo 'sau śrūyate ratnadvīpo nāma vajravaiḍūryendranīlamarakatādīnāṃ ratnānām ākaraḥ iti tam anuprāptāḥ sma;
V03vinv172u:4091: kalyāṇakāriṇā kumāreṇa mahārhāṇi ratnāni kaṭyām upanibaddhāni;
V03vinv172u:4093: tīrasya nātidūre makareṇa matsyajātena anayena vyasanam āpāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4097: tasya parivartamānasya akalyāṇakāriṇā kaṭyupanibaddhāni ratnāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv172u:4101: iti viditvā tena tasya gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdhasya tāni ratnāny apahṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:4103: sa tam andhaṃ samudratīre chorayitvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4104: daivāt gopālakā gāś cārayantas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4106: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tvam īdṛśaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4111: tasya pālabandhor bhāryā yauvanamadākṣepāt vīṇāsvanaṃ śrutvā taṃ prārthayituṃ pravṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4112: sa kṛtaghnaceṣṭitam anusmṛtya karṇau pidhāyāvasthito nādhivāsayati;
V03vinv172u:4113: kāmādhyavasitānāṃ nāsti kiṃcid akaraṇīyam iti tayā svāmi vigrāhitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4114: mām ayam andhaḥ puruṣaḥ prārthayati iti; (A 465b)
V03vinv172u:4119: nāsti kiṃcid asya karaṇīyam ṛte nirvāsanād iti;
V03vinv172u:4120: sa tena gṛhān nirvāsitaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vīṇayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:4123: so 'py anupūrveṇa sīmāntarasya rājño nagaram anuprāptaḥ yenāsya pūrvaṃ duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:4125: tasyā nānādeśanivāsino rājaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś ca varakā āgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:4127: putri yasya tvaṃ dattā sa kalyāṇakārī kumāro mahāsamudraṃ (SBV II 114)
V03vinv172u:4128: gataḥ; tatraiva ca anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4130: yasyaiva tvāṃ na dāsyāmi sa visukho bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:4138_0: tac ca nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv172u:4144_0: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā rājakumārī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā anekakumārīparivṛttā
V03vinv172u:4144_1: vanadevateva kusumitavanamadhye atīva vibhrājamānā mahatā śrīsamudāyena madhye nagarasya
V03vinv172u:4145: sa kalyāṇakārī anyatamasmin pradeśe vīṇām āśrāvayaṃs tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:4147: balavad api hetubalaṃ pratyabalam apekṣata iti;
V03vinv172u:4148: tataḥ sā rājakumārī vīṇāsvanāvarjitahṛdayā vīṇāvādake kalyāṇakāriṇy ākṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:4153_0: kathaṃ nāma nānādeśābhyāgatān rājāmātyapurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca nagaranivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣān
V03vinv172u:4153_1: pratyākhyāya rājakumāryā evaṃrūpayauvanakalāsaṃpadyuktayā andhalakaḥ svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4155: deva kumāryā svayaṃvarāvatīrṇayā svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4160: putri saṃvidyante rājāno dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ amātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś (A 466a)
V03vinv172u:4164: tāta sa eva me rocate iti;
V03vinv172u:4169: vṛtaḥ iti; na te śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4178: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya kalyāṇakāriṇo rājakumārasya tava cāntike rāgaḥ samutpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:4180: anena satyena satyavacanena tavaikam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ syād iti;
V03vinv172u:4181: satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva tasyaikaṃ cakṣuḥ yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ:
V03vinv172u:4186: kathaṃ jñāyate tvam evāsau kalyāṇakārī iti;
V03vinv172u:4188: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya mamākṣiṇī samutpāṭayato 'ntike īṣad api na praduṣṭaṃ cittaṃ me,
V03vinv172u:4189: anena satyena satyavacanena mama dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhaved iti;
V03vinv172u:4190: tasya saha satyayācanayā dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4191: tataḥ sā rājakumārī kalyāṇakāriṇam avikalendriyam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4196: tatas tenāsau duhitā mahatā śrīsamudāyena pariṇītā;
V03vinv172u:4197: sa ca kalyāṇakārī mahatā balasamudāyena tannagaraṃ gatvā akalyāṇakāriṇaṃ cyāvayitvā pitṛke
V03vinv172u:4200: yo 'sau kalyāṇakārī aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4201: yo 'sau akalyṇakārī eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4204: punar apy eṣa yathā akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:4208: bhūtapūrvam anyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:4209: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4210: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kramaśaś catvāraḥ putrā jātāḥ,
V03vinv172u:4220: ekaikāṃ striyaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya tanmāṃsena kāntāramārgān nistarema iti; viśākhaḥ (A 466b)
V03vinv172u:4224: kim atra prāptakālaṃ bhāryām ādāya niṣpalāyeya iti;
V03vinv172u:4226: sāsya bhāryā annapānaviyogān mārgaśramakhedāc ca kāhalībhūtā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4232: tena ūrumāṃsaṃ chitvā tasyā bhakṣaṇāya dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4233: bāhubhyāṃ ca śire muktvā rudhiraṃ pāyitā;
V03vinv172u:4234: so 'nupūrveṇa tām ādāya anyatamaṃ parvatam upasṛptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4236: tasya ca parvatasya sannikṛṣṭe nadī vahati;
V03vinv172u:4237: tasyāṃ puruṣaḥ śatruṇā hastapādavikalaḥ kṛtvā pravāhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4241: sa karuṇāmreḍitacittasantatiḥ parvatam abhiruhya samantād vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4243: sa laghu laghv eva parvatād avatīrya nadīm abhyavagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya nadīm uttīrya tīre sthāpayitvā taṃ duḥkhasantāpitahṛdayaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4249: sā tasyopasthānaṃ kurvatī praṇayasaumukhyā muhur muhur upasaṃkramya vividhābhiḥ kathābhir upatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:4250: dharmatā hy eṣā prakṛtyā mandarāgiṇo bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4251: viśākhas tayā sārdhaṃ kadācit paricārayati kadācin na paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4252: bodhisatvānubhāvena ca tāni kandamūlaphalāni atīva vīryavanti;
V03vinv172u:4253: tāny asau paribhuṃjānā kleśaprābalyāt taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ prārthayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:4256: ahaṃ tāvad idānīṃ gatapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathaṃcij jīvitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4257: yadi punar īdṛśaṃ karomi sthānam etad vidyate yad ayaṃ tava bhartā māṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati iti;
V03vinv172u:4261: sā tena sārdham ānandasaumanasyād eva atīva saṃraktā preṣyamāṇāpi tatsakāśān na gacchati;
V03vinv172u:4268: ayaṃ tava svāmī yadi jānīte āvayoḥ saṃprayogaṃ niyataṃ tava anarthaṃ karoti,
V03vinv172u:4274: sā śiro vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā parvataśilāyāṃ niṣadyāvasthitā;
V03vinv172u:4283: tayā pāṣāṇabhedakaḥ parvataprāgbhāre dṛṣṭaḥ iti sā (A 467a)
V03vinv172u:4284: kathayati: āryaputra pūrvam apy eṣā śirorujā āsid vaidyena pāṣāṇabhedako vyapadiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4292: ṛjuko 'sau mahātmā tasyāḥ śāṭhyaṃ na vetti;
V03vinv172u:4309: yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvaḥ taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4311: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:4312: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:4313: viśākhaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvād rājyasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ nadīm uttīrya ekasmin pradeśe niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4316: pradeśam āgatāḥ paśyanti taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājyalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4317: te pramuditamanasaḥ amātyānāṃ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4318: samanveṣitaḥ asmābhiḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvo yo rājyam arhati iti;
V03vinv172u:4319: tatas tair amātyair mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā mahatā śrīsamudāyena nagaraṃ praveśya divasatithimuhūrtanakṣatrānupūrvyā rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4320_0: tasya devī nāstīti amātyāḥ purohitāḥ bhūmyantararājānaḥ anye ca dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ
V03vinv172u:4320_1: sārthavāhāḥ svakasvakā duhitṝn sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ ādāya tannagaram āgatāḥ rājā pariṇeṣyatīti;
V03vinv172u:4321: sa rājā striyā vipralabdho na pratipadyate;
V03vinv172u:4325: nānādeśanivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣāḥ bhūmyantarāś ca rājānaḥ itastyāś ca pradhānapuruṣāḥ kanyāḥ sajjīkṛtya vyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4329: puṇyānubhāvāt satvānām upabhogā vīryavanto bhavanti saṃpadyante ca;
V03vinv172u:4330: yadā bodhisatvas tasmāt parvatāt kṛtaghnastriyā muktas tadā tasmin parvate mūlaphalāni tanūbhūtāni;
V03vinv172u:4332: tataḥ sā strī durbhikṣākālamṛtyubhayabhītā taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhe āropya grāmāntaṃ samavasṛtā;
V03vinv172u:4335: asti caiṣa lokadharmo yā strī pativratā sā loke pūjyate;
V03vinv172u:4336: sā yatra praviśati tatra bhikṣāṃ labhate;
V03vinv172u:4337: yāvad asāv anupūrveṇa tāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptā;
V03vinv172u:4340: kecit kutūhalajātāḥ tāṃ draṣṭuṃ bahir nirgatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4343: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ rājā sarvāḥ striyo jugupsate;
V03vinv172u:4344: na paśyatīmāṃ satīṃ pativratāṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhenādāya paribhramatīm iti;
V03vinv172u:4348: āhūyatāṃ sā strī paśyāmi iti; sā āhūtā,
V03vinv172u:4352: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā //
V03vinv172u:4353: pātayitvā prapāte māṃ śilodbhedasya kāraṇāt / (SBV II 119)
V03vinv172u:4354: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā // iti
V03vinv172u:4356: yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4357: yāsav bhāryā eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4360: punar apy yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:4364_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyām viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
V03vinv172u:4364_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ
V03vinv172u:4366: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4367: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4368: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4369: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4370: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4371: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:4375: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:4377: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikadhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4378: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:4379: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4381: janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ (SBV II 120)
V03vinv172u:4382_0: pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
V03vinv172u:4382_1: tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye
V03vinv172u:4382_2: muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:4383_0: viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
V03vinv172u:4383_1: mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca
V03vinv172u:4384: tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād api arthinaḥ abhyāgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:4387: atha kecid viprā vedavedāṅgavido viśvantaram abhigamyocuḥ;
V03vinv172u:4388: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4389: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
V03vinv172u:4390: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
V03vinv172u:4391: ity evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ laghu laghv eva tasmād rathād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:4392: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:4393: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām // (SBV II 121)
V03vinv172u:4394_2: parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiḥ candra iva nakṣatragaṇaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte
V03vinv172u:4395: atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprās tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantaraṃ kumāram abhigamya ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:4396: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4398: dātum etaṃ gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4399: evam uktaś ca bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghu laghv eva avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:4400: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:4401: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
V03vinv172u:4403: putreṇa ca tebhyo viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo dattaḥ iti; (A 468b)
V03vinv172u:4404: śrutvā ca punaḥ rājñā visvāmitreṇa kopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4405: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:4406: tato viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ pitrā parityaktaḥ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4407: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktaḥ
V03vinv172u:4408: tad gṛhe vartamānena dānaṃ deyaṃ yathābalam /
V03vinv172u:4409: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśritya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
V03vinv172u:4410: tad ahaṃ gṛham utsṛjya prayāsyāmi tapovanam /
V03vinv172u:4411: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4412: athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśam abhigamya etad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa;
V03vinv172u:4413: tataḥ sā mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva (SBV II 122)
V03vinv172u:4415: āryaputra yady evam aham api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4416: na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:4417: gaganam iva candrahīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
V03vinv172u:4418: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā bhavet tathā nārī // iti
V03vinv172u:4429: tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4430: tatra bhavatyā na kiṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4431: tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti;
V03vinv172u:4433: āryaputra yathāśaktyā aham āryaputram anuvartiṣye iti;
V03vinv172u:4435: yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñā iti;
V03vinv172u:4436: tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram upagamya mūrdhnā ca praṇipatyovāca
V03vinv172u:4437: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
V03vinv172u:4438: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūt // iti
V03vinv172u:4440: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti;
V03vinv172u:4443: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteya mahīpate //
V03vinv172u:4445: tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaḥ paurajānapadasahasrair anugamyamānaḥ tasmān nagarān nirjagāma;
V03vinv172u:4446: kaścit puruṣaḥ taṃ rudanaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā anyataraṃ puruṣam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:4447: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanasya ruditaśabdaḥ iti; sa uvāca:
V03vinv172u:4452: paurāḥ sametya subhṛśaṃ karuṇaṃ rudanti // iti
V03vinv172u:4453: tato bodhisatvas tasmān nagarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyyam abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:4455: suciram api hi priyasaṃyogo bhūtvā avaśyam evānte (A 469a)
V03vinv172u:4459: sarveṣu lokeṣv avaśasya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavantīti matvā /
V03vinv172u:4460: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakampyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4461: atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣya anyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:4464: tad arhati bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:4465: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4466: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajam /
V03vinv172u:4467: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute // iti
V03vinv172u:4469: na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:4470: yady ete na bhaveyur artharucayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
V03vinv172u:4471: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
V03vinv172u:4473: dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:4474: tato bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ pareṇa harṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvā uvāca
V03vinv172u:4475: anena mātsaryamalapravāhinā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija / (SBV II 124)
V03vinv172u:4476: maharṣibhiḥ sadbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4477: tato viśvantaraḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau;
V03vinv172u:4479: tato viśvantaras tasmiṃs tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra;
V03vinv172u:4487: tadarthaṃ bālakāv etau mama tvaṃ dātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4488: evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati muhūrtaṃ cintāparo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:4493: yathā śibiḥ śruto nityaṃ tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4494: evam ukto bodhisatvas taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:4497: kiṃ punaḥ svasutatyāge mama syān matir anyathā //
V03vinv172u:4501: mā bhūd vaktā ca me kaścit kumārau nirghṛṇo bhṛśam /
V03vinv172u:4502: bālau tyajati nātmānaṃ sādhu brāhmaṇa māṃ naya // iti
V03vinv172u:4505_0: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra naitad bhavataḥ pratirūpaṃ mahati rājavaṃśe prasūtasya sarvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:4505_1: pṛthivyāṃ khyātayaśasaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu dayānukrośapravṛttasya dānamānasatkāragandhahastinaḥ (SBV II 125)

V03vinv172u:4507: mogho vā mārgaśramaḥ nirarthakaṃ vā darśanam;
V03vinv172u:4508: aphalā sā āśā cirakālāśāsito vā cetasy āśāsakaḥ;
