V03vinv172u:4510: tad arhati bhavān paripūrṇamanorathaṃ māṃ visarjayituṃ kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:4515: na tava sudaṃṣṭra samo 'sti dānaśaktyā // iti
V03vinv172u:4516: athaitad vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasyopaśrutya viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ imāṃ cintām āpede tanayasnehaviklavaḥ
V03vinv172u:4518: prāpsyāmy ahaṃ ca mādrī ca duḥkhaṃ putraviyogajam //
V03vinv172u:4521: kāmaṃ putraviyogārto bhuvi śokaṃ vrajāmy aham /
V03vinv172u:4522: bhagnapratijño na tv eva bhaviṣyāmi kṣatavrataḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4523: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati kṛtaniścaya uvāca: eṣa bho
V03vinv172u:4524: lokaṃ duḥkhamāharṇave pratibhaye majjantam ārtaṃ bhṛśam
V03vinv172u:4527: bālāv aśrujalāmbupūrṇanayanau viprāya tasmai dadau // (SBV II 126)
V03vinv172u:4530: tārayeyam ahaṃ tena lokaṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4531: dattamātrayoś ca punas tayor bāladārakayoḥ iyaṃ ca vasumatī ṣaḍvikāraṃ cacāla;
V03vinv172u:4532: tatas tena bhūmikampena tadvanavāsinas tāpasāḥ saṃtrastāḥ anyonyam ūcuḥ
V03vinv172u:4534: jñatavyam iha suvyaktaṃ prabhāvaḥ kasya īdṛśaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4536: sa teṣām ṛṣīṇām etam arthaṃ nivedayāmāsa
V03vinv172u:4540: viśvantaras tyajati kampati yena bhūmiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4541: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:4544: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
V03vinv172u:4545: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān // iti
V03vinv172u:4546: tato bodhisatvaḥ snehaviklavaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanaḥ tau bāladārakau (A 470a)
V03vinv172u:4548: na me hṛdayam asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇam /
V03vinv172u:4550: apy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
V03vinv172u:4552: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgam avagamya karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
V03vinv172u:4553: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
V03vinv172u:4554: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum amba tvam arhasi // iti (SBV II 127)
V03vinv172u:4556: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabhāvāt
V03vinv172u:4557: yady apriyaṃ vacanam anyad udāhṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinv172u:4558: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca paripūritam eva na syāt
V03vinv172u:4560: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanalālasau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramād viniścakrāmatuḥ;
V03vinv172u:4561: tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapovanaparṇakuṭīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4562: niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca bāladārakayoḥ ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4563: anekaiś ca devatāsahasraiḥ hāhākṛtam antarikṣaṃ babhūva
V03vinv172u:4564: aho pradānamāhātmyam aho khalv asya niścayaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4565: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4566: tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāya āśramābhimukhī saṃprasthitā;
V03vinv172u:4567: tena ca mahatā bhūmikampena tvaritam āśramapadaṃ pratasthe;
V03vinv172u:4568: anyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyāvasthitā,
V03vinv172u:4569: mā haiva mādrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:4580: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:4581: tato mādrī nimittāny apraśastānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4583: yathā vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vikrośanaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4584: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4585: dhruvaṃ tau bālakau tyaktau yathā me matir utsukā //
V03vinv172u:4586: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkampo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
V03vinv172u:4587: vyaktau tau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati // iti
V03vinv172u:4588: sā evam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:4592: asmin pradeśe jālinaḥ kumāraḥ sahabhaginyā mṛgapotakair (A 470b)
V03vinv172u:4597_0: atha vā ambā na dṛśyate iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ ity evam āśaṅkāparigatahṛdayā
V03vinv172u:4597_1: sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchati:
V03vinv172u:4601: tasya tau dārakau dattau tvam anujñātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4602: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta;
V03vinv172u:4603: jalāśayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ karoti sma;
V03vinv172u:4605: naṣṭavatseva gaur bahuvidhaṃ hambhāravair vilalāpa; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4609: kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
V03vinv172u:4613: vrajatas tasya vaśe na duḥkhitau // (SBV II 129)
V03vinv172u:4638: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāyapālitakās tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
V03vinv172u:4643: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakān āśramavāsino mṛgaśābakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ vacanam uvāca (SBV II 130)
V03vinv172u:4648: tato yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny anṛjukāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca (A 471a)
V03vinv172u:4655: tato bodhisatvas tāṃ tathā paridevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:4656: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
V03vinv172u:4657: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
V03vinv172u:4659: prāpnuvanti mahāsatvāḥ śibivad bodhim uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:4662: dadyāṃ svān dārān vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ
V03vinv172u:4663: sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // iti
V03vinv172u:4664: atha mādrī dhairyam ālambya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4665: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
V03vinv172u:4666: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayaccha mām //
V03vinv172u:4669: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tārayan hi bhavāj jagat // iti
V03vinv172u:4670: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ ca mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam āgamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ upari (SBV II 131)
V03vinv172u:4671: vihāyasā tadāśramapadam upagamya udāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4674: tvam eko niḥsaṅgas tyajasi tanayān snehajanakān
V03vinv172u:4675: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalavirajaṃ prāpsyasi padam // iti
V03vinv172u:4676: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4679: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4683: nirlajjaś cāpi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4684: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām // iti
V03vinv172u:4685: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4687: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
V03vinv172u:4688: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4695: idam asmin vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
V03vinv172u:4697: iti viditvā mādrīpāṇau gṛhitvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4699: mama bhāryām imām iṣṭāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama // iti
V03vinv172u:4701: ṣaḍvikārā mahī kṛtsnā cacālāmbuni naur yathā //
V03vinv172u:4702: tato mādrī bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhā brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛrahitā idam abhravīt
V03vinv172u:4703: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
V03vinv172u:4704: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
V03vinv172u:4705: tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
V03vinv172u:4706: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
V03vinv172u:4707: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
V03vinv172u:4709: tad brūhi kiṃ varam ihecchasi matsakāśāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4713: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramapadaṃ praviśya bodhisatvam upajagmivān;
V03vinv172u:4714: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhitvā bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4715: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
V03vinv172u:4716: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4717: tato śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigrahītāraṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathā anyanagaraśaṅkayā tad eva nagaram upetya tau bāladārakau vikretum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4719: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
V03vinv172u:4720: jālinaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte sudāruṇaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4725: yāvad anyenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau (SBV II 133)
V03vinv172u:4732: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam // iti
V03vinv172u:4733: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasya svabhavanam upajagāma;
V03vinv172u:4734: paścāc ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadāśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān;
V03vinv172u:4736: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:4742: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmin loke paratra ca // iti
V03vinv172u:4743: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ; tasya (A 472a)
V03vinv172u:4745: yā ca kācit tava śrīr asau viśvantaraṃ kumāram āgamya iti;
V03vinv172u:4752: yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4753: yo 'sau jujjukaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4756: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśyayiṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4758: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam (SBV II 134)
V03vinv172u:4762: tena khalu samayena campāyāṃ potalo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:4763: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:4765: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4766: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4767: sā upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇaiḥ uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ vaidyaprajñaptair āhāraiḥ,
V03vinv172u:4768: nātitiktaiḥ nātyamlaiḥ nātilavaṇaiḥ nātimadhuraiḥ nātikaṭukaī nātikaṣāyaiḥ tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukaṣāyavivarjitaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4769: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī apsarā iva nandane vane vicāriṇī maṃcān maṃcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmiṃ;
V03vinv172u:4770: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad garbhasya paripākāya
V03vinv172u:4771: tena khalu samayena potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:4772: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt śravaṇe nakṣatre prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4774: tasya pādatalayor adhastāt caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi suvarṇavarṇavarṇāni jātāni;
V03vinv172u:4775: yāvat potalakasya gṛhapateḥ svamanuṣyaḥ tvaritatvaritaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ,
V03vinv172u:4777: gṛhapate diṣṭyā vardhase putras te jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4778: sa prītisaumanasyajātaḥ bhūyaḥ pṛcchati kiṃ kathayasi gṛhapate putras te jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4780: atha tasya puruṣasyaitad abhavat kim ayaṃ gṛhapatir bhūyo bhūyaḥ pṛcchati?
V03vinv172u:4781: mā māṃ pralāpayitukāmaḥ iti viditvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4784: yadi tvayā śatam api vāṅ niścāritābhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:4785: mayāpi tava mukhaṃ suvarṇasya pūritam abhaviṣyat iti;
V03vinv172u:4786: tataḥ potalakena gṛhapatinā tasya puruṣasya trīn vārān suvarṇena mukhaṃ (A 472b)
V03vinv172u:4787: pūritaṃ; koṣṭhāgārikasya ca sandiṣṭaṃ dārakasyāvalehikāmūlyaṃ viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭīr dehi iti
V03vinv172u:4788: potalako gṛhapatiḥ prītamanāḥ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ deva putro me jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4791: ahaṃ tasya campāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saptahastikaṃ dānīyam iti;
V03vinv172u:4792: potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājānaṃ bimbisāram avalokya campām āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:4793: tato gṛhapater jñātayaḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:4796: pitrā cāsya janmani viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlyaṃ dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4797: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:4798: tasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4800: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4801: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:4802: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4803: uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4804: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu udghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4805: tasya puṇyamaheśākhyatāṃ śrutvā samānakulīnair bahubhir dārikā dattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4806: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4807: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4808: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyaiṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4809: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4810: tasya dine dine paṃcaśatikāḥ pāko bhojanārthaṃ sādhyate
V03vinv172u:4813: seeks to take his father King Bimbisāra's life but fails in the attempt
V03vinv172u:4815: kumāra sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ yadā śirasi palitaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03vinv172u:4818: bhavataḥ pituḥ keśās tṛtīyaṃ varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4819: tathāpi kāmeṣv adhyavasita eva nopaśamaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4824: yāvad rājā bimbisāro bhagavato ghṛtapītasya maṇḍaṃ pātukāmasya maṇḍam adhiṣṭhāya veṇuvanaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4831: The Buddha, desiring to convert Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa,
V03vinv172u:4833: who appears to him in the orb of the sun,
V03vinv172u:4834: and talks to him of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4835: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ; tatra (A 473a)
V03vinv172u:4837: vinipātito maudgalyāyana ajātaśatruṇā akalyāṇamitropagūḍhena tathāgatasya piṇḍapātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4838: gaccha campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya sakāśāt piṇḍapātam ādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:4839: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte rājagṛhe 'ntarhitaś campāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt;
V03vinv172u:4841: sa dine dine kālyam evotthāya ādityaṃ namasyati;
V03vinv172u:4842: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyayānaḥ ṛddhyā ādityamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvā avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4843: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4844: pratyakṣam evāham ādityaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4848: syāt kiṃ nv ayaṃ dinakaro dhanadaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
V03vinv172u:4850: āyuṣmān api mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 137)
V03vinv172u:4852: nāhaṃ vaiśravaṇo cāsmi bhagavān nāsmīśvaras suvrataḥ /
V03vinv172u:4853: putraṃ mām avagaccha śāntamanaso buddhasya dīptaujasaḥ
V03vinv172u:4854: bhaikṣārthaṃ tu tavāham abhyupagataḥ piṇḍena kāryaṃ punaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4858: meruṃ prāpya yathā hi kāṃcanagiriṃ syāt sarṣapo 'bhyāgataḥ
V03vinv172u:4859: sūryaṃ prāpya yathā bhavec ca tulitaḥ khadyotajantuḥ kṣitau /
V03vinv172u:4860: ratnāḍhyaṃ ca sametya sāgaram iha syād goṣpadaṃ saṃsṛtam
V03vinv172u:4861: buddhaṃ prāpya tathā narottamaguruṃ māṃ viddhi śāstātmajam // iti
V03vinv172u:4869: asti gṛhapatiputra śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4872: tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā saromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭāṇi;
V03vinv172u:4873: tenābhiprasannena sa eva paṃcaśatikaḥ pākaḥ āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pratipāditaḥ
V03vinv172u:4875: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa fills his bowl with food of extraordinary fragrance,
V03vinv172u:4876: which Mahāmaudgalyāyana carries back to the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4877: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasyāntikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte campāyām antarhito rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād venuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:4880: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ dvitīyaṃ sthālipākam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:4881: yāvat paśyati sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena (SBV II 138)
V03vinv172u:4884: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4885: yathedaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam;
V03vinv172u:4887: kiṃ bhadanta śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapāta upanītaḥ?
V03vinv172u:4888: yena veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam iti;
V03vinv172u:4890: na mahārāja śakreṇa devendreṇa nāpy anyābhir devatābhir upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4891: api tu tavaiva vijite campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya dine dine paṃcaśatikaḥ sthālīpākaḥ sādhyate;
V03vinv172u:4893: tasya bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ iti śrutvāpi tasya darśanakāmatā utpannā;
V03vinv172u:4894: bhagavāṃs tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4908: asti mahārāja tvayā kadācid evaṃrūpam annapānaṃ paribhuktapūrvaṃ?
V03vinv172u:4911: rājā ca saṃvṛttaḥ nābhijānāty evaṃrūpam annapānam āsvāditapūrvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4912: puṇyamaheśākhyo mahārāja sa satvaḥ ya īdṛśam annapānaṃ paribhuṅkte
V03vinv172u:4914: King Bimbisāra desires to see Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa
V03vinv172u:4915: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4937: kumāraḥ, kadācid āgata anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:4941: api tu yuṣmābhir gaṅgā tathā baddhavyā yathā pratilomā vahati;
V03vinv172u:4944: yenaivaṃ likhati iti tair amātyānām anena arthena lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4945: tair vācayitvā punas teṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ sandiṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:4954: tatas te saṃbhūya potalakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4960: yo mama bhāgas taṃ suvarṇapiṇḍair api badhnīyām iti;
V03vinv172u:4962: gṛhapate yady apy evaṃ tathāpi paścimā janatā anukampitavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:4965: yadi yuṣmākam api putrāḥ śroṇena sārdhaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4970: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa goes to Rājagṛha to visit Bimbisāra
V03vinv172u:4971: atha potalako gṛhapatir yena śroṇakoṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4976: putra nūnaṃ sa rājā tava pādayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi draṣṭukāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4977: na tvayā tasya pādau utkṣipya darśayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:4981: etaṃ rājñaḥ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvā praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā tasya purastāt paryaṅkaṃ badhvā niṣīda;
V03vinv172u:4996: tad anayā vibhūtyā jalamadhyena preṣitaḥ; (SBV II 140)
V03vinv172u:4998: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutaṃ potalakaputraḥ āgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:5000: yāvac ca nādī gaṅgā atrāntarāt khātam asyāḥ pūrayitvā tanmadhyena naur ākṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:5001_0: rājagṛhaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv172u:5003: tato 'sau rājñaḥ siṃhāsanasthasya muktāhāraṃ pādayor datvā,
V03vinv172u:5006: rājā tasya pādatalayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5009: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa and King Bimbisāra go together to the Bamboo grove in order to see the Buddha
V03vinv172u:5013: sa pṛcchati deva kiṃ bhagavān yānena gaccchati?
V03vinv172u:5019: deva yady evam aham api pādābhyām eva gacchāmi iti,
V03vinv172u:5038: tenāśayato vāṅ niścāritā apanayantu amanuṣyā vastrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:5058: ito bhikṣava ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācit potalakaputreṇa anāstīrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5064: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5065: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5066: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:5067: yāṃ śrutvā śroṇena koṭīviṃśena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5068: sa dṛṣṭasatya utthāya āsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:5069: yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5070: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaya pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:5072: na khalu gṛhaputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā ananujñātaṃ kulaputraṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti upasaṃpādayanti vā;
V03vinv172u:5074: rājā kathayati ahaṃ bhadanta prabhuḥ sarvādhikaraṇānām;
V03vinv172u:5075: arthe mamaiva dharmatayā ayaṃ putro bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5078: tato bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:5081: pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmasruḥ varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ; āha cātra
V03vinv172u:5089: ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kiṃ viśeṣam adhigamiṣyati iti (SBV II 142)
V03vinv172u:5090: sa tair avasphaṇḍito yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5092_0: kataro bhadanta ānanda bhagavatā ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoḥ yogānukūlas samādhir uktaḥ
V03vinv172u:5092_1: āyuṣman śroṇa bhagavatoktaṃ caṅkramata avigatasamādhiś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:5092_2: tena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gatvā caṅkramo 'dhiṣṭhitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5093: tatrāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne yuktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5094: sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto bhavati
V03vinv172u:5096: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa gives himself to severe penances. The example of the lute
V03vinv172u:5097: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
V03vinv172u:5098: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:5100: atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:5101: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5102: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;
V03vinv172u:5105: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya anyatamaṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:5108: upasaṃkramya śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam evaṃ vada śāstā tvāṃ śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:5109: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5110: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5111: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:5112: evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5113: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5114: āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśaṃ bhagavān idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5115: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi?
V03vinv172u:5116: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:5118: atha ca punar me nānupādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:5121: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuñjīya;
V03vinv172u:5124: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭīviṃśasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:5126: iti viditvā bhītas trastas saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:5128: tena hi śroṇa tvām eva pṛcchāmi;
V03vinv172u:5131: kuśalas tvam abhūḥ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane;
V03vinv172u:5132: tathyam ahaṃ bhadanta kuśalo 'bhūvaṃ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane:
V03vinv172u:5134: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atyātatā bhavanti,
V03vinv172u:5137: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5139: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atiślathā bhavanti api nu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:5140: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5142: atha punar yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ nātyātatā bhavanti nātiślathāḥ saha guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:5143: nanu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā vā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:5144: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:5146: evam eva śroṇa atyārabdhaṃ vīryam atyauddhatyāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv172u:5152: anena tvaṃ śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:5158: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa follows the advice of the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:5159: and in a short time becomes an arhat
V03vinv172u:5160: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5161: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavatā anena vīṇopamena avavādenāvavāditaḥ eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
V03vinv172u:5162: eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan,
V03vinv172u:5163: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy (SBV II 144)
V03vinv172u:5164: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
V03vinv172u:5165: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayate:
V03vinv172u:5170: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ
V03vinv172u:5171: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇāsya koṭīviṃśasya arhatvaprāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedinaḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:5172: ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ,
V03vinv172u:5174: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ sāyāhne oratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena hagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5175: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv172u:5176: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat
V03vinv172u:5179_0: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ
V03vinv172u:5179_1: anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sa tasmin samaye
V03vinv172u:5181: trṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃ moṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5182: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ śraddhāmātrakaṃ,
V03vinv172u:5183: bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya naiṣkramyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5184: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya naiṣkramyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5185: syāt khalu ihaikatyasya evaṃ śīlamātrakaṃ bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya avyābādhyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5187: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya avyābādhyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5188: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ lābhasatkāraślokamātrakaṃ (SBV II 145)
V03vinv172u:5189: bata ayam āyuṣmān parimṛgayamāṇāḥ prāvivekyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:5191: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya tṛṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃmoṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5193: kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ tasmin samaye imāni ṣaṭ sthānāny adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:5194: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:5195: tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5196: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtya upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
V03vinv172u:5201: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5202: tadyathā dahraḥ kumārako bālo mandaḥ uttānaśāyī tasmin samaye dahraiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati dahraiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5204: indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt sa tasmin samaye vṛddhaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati vṛddhaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5205: evam eva yo 'sau bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:5206: sa tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatiṃ śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5207: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtva upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
V03vinv172u:5212: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:5213: tasya cet bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ paryādadate;

V03vinv172u:5249: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5251: paṃcaśatikaś cāsya dine dine sthālipāka upasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:5252: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5254: bhagavataś ca śāsane praviśya sarvakleśaprahāṇās arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
V03vinv172u:5256: śroṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ koṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:5257: śroṇakoṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?

V03vinv172u:5262: upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:5263: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:5264: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:5268: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:5269: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:5270: sa dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīrājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5271: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ saṃbahulā goṣṭhikāḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:5272: taiḥ śrutaṃ vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran ihānuprāptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5273: śrutvā ca punaḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5274: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5275: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān sambahulān goṣṭhikān vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:5278: atha sambahulā goṣṭhikāḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:5279: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃghena iti /
V03vinv172u:5280: adhivāsayati vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃbahulānāṃ goṣṭhikānāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena
V03vinv172u:5281_0: atha saṃbahulā goṣṭhikā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā
V03vinv172u:5281_1: bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā uttahāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5282: te saṃsthāgāre sannipatya sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5283: katham asmābhir bhavanto bhagavān bhojayitavyaḥ kiṃ saṃbhūya āhosvid ekaikena iti;
V03vinv172u:5285: yadi dine dine saṃbhūya bhojayitavyo 'sau asmākaṃ kṛṣikarmāntāḥ samucchetsyanti;
V03vinv172u:5286: tad yadi bhavatām abhirucitaṃ vāreṇa vāraṃ bhojayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5287: te vāreṇa vāraṃ gaṇādhīnaṃ bhojayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5296: putra yady evam apaścimaṃ divasaṃ gṛhāṇa;
V03vinv172u:5298: gaṇasantakāc ca kiṃcid utsadanadharmakaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5308: tataḥ paṃcaśatikaṃ pākaṃ sādhayitvā mahatā satkāreṇa vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bhojitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5309: pādayoś ca praṇipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo jāyeya;
V03vinv172u:5310: mā kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpayeyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5311: yādṛśāni ca vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi pādatalayor jātāni,
V03vinv172u:5317: yo 'sau goṣṭhiko brāhmaṇadārakaḥ eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:5329: Rājagṛha's people begins tu murmur against Ajātaśatru and Devadatta
V03vinv172u:5330: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattākalyāṇamitropagūḍhena rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5331: tatra kecid rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣante ayaṃ pituḥ śatrutve vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5332: kasmān na jātamātra eva praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5340: na bhavanto rājño doṣaḥ nāpi devadattasya;
V03vinv172u:5343: no tu lokadhātvantaraṃ nītvā avasthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5346: api tu saṃghasya yenāsya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma na kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:5347: tatra yena rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate tena (SBV II 150)
V03vinv172u:5348: na rājā ārtīyate karmāṇy etāni mayā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu kṛtāni upacitāni iti;
V03vinv172u:5349: yena tu bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate,
V03vinv172u:5351: madīyena durnītena loko bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣate iti
V03vinv172u:5352: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /

V03vinv172u:5360: The story of Kūla and Upakūla
V03vinv172u:5361: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta and Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:5362: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:5363: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:5364: tasya dvau kukkurau kūlaś ca upakūlaś ca;
V03vinv172u:5366: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño brahmadattasya saṃgrāmaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5374: bhavanto yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kukkurāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5377: yāvad anyatamo jānapadaḥ kukkuraḥ janapadād vārāṇasīṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:5378: tena te niṣpalāyamānā dṛṣṭāḥ; pṛṣṭāś ca:
V03vinv172u:5379: bhavantaḥ kimartham evaṃ yūyaṃ santrastāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5382: kimarthaṃ rājā yuṣmābhir na vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5384: kaḥ śaknoti rājānaṃ vijñapayitum anya praghātitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5388: ahaṃ yuṣmākam arthe rājānaṃ vijñapayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:5390: tatas tena saṃpātavelāyāṃ śravaṇopavicāre sthitvā rājā gāthayā vijñaptaḥ
V03vinv172u:5394: aghātyaghāto na hi deva yuktaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:5396: tena prabhātāyaṃ rajanyām amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:5397: bhavanto yenāhaṃ rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ tasya samanveṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:5399: samanveṣatat bhavantaḥ kena devo rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5402: bhavantaḥ parīkṣāṃ kuruta kiṃ kūlopakūlābhyāṃ bhakṣitam āhosvit anyaiḥ kukkuraiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5404: bhavanto devenaivājñā dattā kukkurāṇāṃ parīkṣāṃ kuruteti;
V03vinv172u:5405: tat katham eṣāṃ parīkṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:5407: kim atra parīkṣitavyaṃ keśāṇḍukaṃ datvā chardāpayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:5413: yau kūlopakūlau etāv eva devadattājātaśatrū tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5414: tadāpi etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5415: etarhy api etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5416: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:5418: The story of a hunter and an ungrateful man
V03vinv172u:5420: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:5422: paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:5436: yāvat daivān mṛgalubdhako mṛgān paryeṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5437: sa taṃ kūpaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 152)
V03vinv172u:5440: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena jñātvā pūrvataraṃ siṃha uddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5445: kṛtaghnā hy eta bhavanti ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5446: yāvat tena mṛgalubdhakena sarve anupūrveṇa uddhṛtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5447: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhena mṛgo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5448: sa ca mṛgalubdhakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5449: siṃhena taṃ parijñāya sa mṛgaḥ pādayor nipatya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5450: apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa;
V03vinv172u:5451: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5452: antaḥpurajano viśvastavihārī udyāne caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5455: yāvad anyatamā antaḥpurikā alaṃkāram avamucya pārśve sthāpayitvā middham avakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:5456: tat śyenakenāpahṛtya tasmai lubdhakāya kṛtajñatayā dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5457: rājā brahmadatto nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5462: deva udyāne me alaṃkāraḥ apahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5467: sa kṛṣṇaśiraskaḥ tasya mṛgalubdhakasya kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5468: tena tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāmatā upāṃśunā vijñātam asyālaṃkāro 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:5470: tato rājñā paramakopakupitena mṛgalubdhako rājapuruṣair āhvāyya uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5471: bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā udyānād alaṃkāro 'pahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5472: tatas tena santrastena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyāya asāv alaṃkāro rājñe samarpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5473: tathāpy asau puruṣaḥ cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5475: tena kṛṣṇaśiraskena pāpakāriṇā asmākaṃ kalyāṇamitro rājñā cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5478: daśāmi; tvayā ebhir mantrapadair ebhiś ca oṣadhaiḥ cikitsitavyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5479: evaṃ sa rājā abhiprasanno niyataṃ tvāṃ muñcati;
V03vinv172u:5484: lubdhakena gatvā mantraiś cauṣadhaiś ca cikitsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5489: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5490: yo 'sau kṛtaghnapuruṣaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5493: punar api yathā akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:5502: yāvad asau nakulas taṃ mūṣikam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5515: tayor arthāya āśayena āhāraṃ paryeṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5520: priyasenaḥ saṃlakṣayati kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāpto 'py eṣas tasya badhāya parākramati;
V03vinv172u:5521: prāg eva yady asau vinā āhāreṇa āgacchati;
V03vinv172u:5525: yadi gaṅgadattaḥ vinā āhāreṇāgacchati sa eva mayā bhakṣayitavya iti;
V03vinv172u:5526: gaṅgadattena āhāraṃ paryeṣamāṇena na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5527: sa saṃlakṣayati niyatam asau māṃ bhakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:5534: yo 'sau gaṅgadattaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5535: yo 'sau nandanāmā nakulaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5537: etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī (SBV II 154)
V03vinv172u:5539: bhuṅkṣva likhir naṭaḥ kākaḥ cakraḥ kumbhīracandanam /
V03vinv172u:5540: kāyaḥ kavir maṇir vaṇṭaḥ kanyātha dhanapālakaḥ //
V03vinv172u:5542: King Bimbisāra makes exceeding grants to Ajātaśatru
V03vinv172u:5543: yadā ajātaśatruṇā rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājñā upālabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5544: kumāra kimarthaṃ tvayā mama kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5545: deva roṣāt; devasya bhogāḥ saṃvidyante; mama na (A 480b)
V03vinv172u:5548: putra yady evaṃ gaccha campā sādhāraṇā tava bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:5549: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudito devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5550: ārya mayā campā sādhāraṇā labdhā iti;
V03vinv172u:5552: kumāra dṛṣṭaṃ te parākramasya phalam ārya dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5562: tad arhati devaḥ kumārasya nivāraṇaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:5568: yady evaṃ rājagṛham ekaṃ tyaktvā magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhāṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:5569: magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati: ārya mayā (SBV II 155)
V03vinv172u:5570: rājagṛham ekaṃ muktvā sarvo magadhaviṣayo labdhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5578: sa rājñā āhūyoktaḥ kumāra kimarthaṃ magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:5579: sa kathayati deva prabhūto janakāyo na puṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5581: kumāra yady evaṃ kośam ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:5582: sa rājagṛham api gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayati:

V03vinv172u:6404_3: abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmā ity udghoṣayanti;
V03vinv172u:6407: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
V03vinv172u:6408: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
V03vinv172u:6410: atha tā arciṣas trisahasramahāsahasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti;
V03vinv172u:6411: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
V03vinv172u:6419: balacakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati vāme karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:6420: cakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati dakṣiṇe karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:6424: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante
V03vinv172u:6425: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6443: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti

V03vinv172u:6447: eṣā sā ānanda dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca kṣīraprado nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:6448: ayam asyā deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:6453: nānādeśanivāsino bhikṣavaḥ abhyāgatāḥ bhagavata evaṃvidham ābādhaṃ (SBV II 174)

V03vinv172u:6461_0: bhikṣavaḥ pramuditamanasaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakāḥ upāsikyaḥ bhūyasā sarva
V03vinv172u:6461_1: eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sthāpayitvā devadattājātaśatrū kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:6462: bhagavān jānann eva yo yathā cikitsāṃ karoti,
V03vinv172u:6465: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6466: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena satyopayācanayā sravad rudhiraṃ vidhāritam iti;
V03vinv172u:6468: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani aham anena viṣakṛtena paryākulīkṛto nirviṣīkṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6473: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6474: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati phalamūlāmbubhakṣaḥ ajinavalkalavāsāḥ vidyāmantradhārī ca;
V03vinv172u:6477: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6478: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6479: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6481: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6484: sthito śayito vā kuśalaṃ cittam atikuśalaṃ ca karma karoti;
V03vinv172u:6485: tasya janakāyena dharmakāma iti saṃjñā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:6486: sa kiṃkuśalagaveṣitayā karvaṭakān niṣkramya kālānukālaṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:6493: sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6494: maharṣe upasthāyakas te viṣakṛtena prāṇair viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:6497: samaṃ te dāraka cittaṃ mitreṣv api ripuṣv api /
V03vinv172u:6498: anena satyavākyena nirviṣo bhava dāraka // iti
V03vinv172u:6500: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6501: yo 'sau ṛṣiḥ eṣa eva sa daśabalakāśyapaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6503: etarhy apy aham anena satyopayācanena svasthīkṛtaḥ
V03vinv172u:6507: vyarthaṃ mayā śramaṇasya gautamasya śilā kṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:6510: sa vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā cintāparaḥ kṛtakena paryaṅkaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6516: kiṃ bhavanto yadvā tadvā asamīkṣya kathayanti nanu paśyata devadattam asmin vṛkṣamūle;
V03vinv172u:6519: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6520: paśya bhadanta amī kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ ātmanā alajjinaḥ alajjino devadattasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante iti;
V03vinv172u:6522: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani ete alajjina alajjino varṇam abhāṣanta;
V03vinv172u:6525: The story of a jackal and a crow
V03vinv172u:6526: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta, etc.)
V03vinv172u:6527: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājagṛhīyakair manuṣyaiḥ rājñā ca kenacit kāraṇena kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā dve śmaśāne vyavasthāpite,
V03vinv172u:6528: ekasmin pradeśe puruṣāś chorayitavyāḥ ekasmin striyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6530: sa na ekasmin śmaśāne avakāśaṃ labhate,
V03vinv172u:6531: na dvitīye; rājagṛhasyānyatamasmin pradeśe udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6534: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe trikaṇṭakedārairaṇḍavṛkṣāś ca santi;
V03vinv172u:6542: sa tasya gāthayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6543: siṃhasya te yathā grīvā ṛṣabhasya yathā kaṭiḥ /
V03vinv172u:6544: mṛgarāja namas tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:6547: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvāḥ bhrājate ratnapiṇḍavat // iti
V03vinv172u:6550: mṛharāja nams tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:6553: ākrandacāriṇāṃ śreṣṭha ehi bhuṅkṣva yathāsukhaṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:6554: so 'vatīrṇaḥ sṛgālena saha kuṇapaṃ bhakṣayan tena ṛṣiṇā dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6557: vṛkṣādhamasya cchāyāyāṃ bhuñjate kuṇapaṃ saha // iti
V03vinv172u:6560: yadi siṃho myūraś ca bhuñjate varajāṅgalam /
V03vinv172u:6563: pakṣiṇām adhamaḥ kākaḥ jambukaś ca catuṣpadām /
V03vinv172u:6564: eraṇḍaś cāpi vṛkṣāṇāṃ mauṣyānāṃ ca paṇḍakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:6566: tataḥ kāko bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo ṛṣer agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati kiṃcit;
V03vinv172u:6568: yāvad asau ṛṣir agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya paśyati kamaṇḍaluṃ bhagnaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6572: na rocyās tādṛśāḥ kecid alajināḥ krūrāśayāḥ /
V03vinv172u:6574: avarṇārho na varṇārhaḥ na vācyaṃ khalu sarvathā /
V03vinv172u:6575: kiṃcin matimatā nityaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:6576: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6577: sṛgālo devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena,
V03vinv172u:6578: kākaḥ kokālikaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6579: tadāpy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇam abhāṣātām;
V03vinv172u:6580: etarhy apy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇaṃ bhāṣete
V03vinv172u:6581: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6582: kutra bhadanta bhagavato devadattasya ca tatprathamato vairūkṣyam utpannam iti;
V03vinv172u:6585: The story of the two birds Dharma and Adharma
V03vinv172u:6586: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6587: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau jīvajīvakau ekena kāyena samudratīre prativasataḥ dharmaś cādharmaś ca;
V03vinv172u:6617: yāvad apareṇa samayena dharmo middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6624: yatra yatra janmani tava vadhakaḥ syāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6627: tatra tatra janmani tava maitryupasaṃhāraṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:6629: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dharmaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6630: yo 'sāv adharmaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6637: The story of Sūryanemi the poet
V03vinv172u:6638: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6639: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sarjaraso nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:6640: tena bhūmyantarasya rājñaḥ sakāśād dārikā labdhā;
V03vinv172u:6641: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6642: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ sā dārikā kālāntareṇa āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6643: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt sūryodaye prasūtā; dārako (SBV II 179)
V03vinv172u:6645: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyte kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:6651: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:6652: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:6653: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:6654_0: yāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ
V03vinv172u:6654_1: mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni
V03vinv172u:6654_2: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe
V03vinv172u:6654_3: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe
V03vinv172u:6654_4: śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6659: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā sarjarasaḥ dharmayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6660: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ dharmā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6663: sa rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭe badhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:6673: ayam amātyo goniṣādaḥ mayā praṇītair bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:6681: tvayā matpriyatayā tathā anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā dharmā sūryaneminā jīvitān na vyaparopyate (SBV II 180)
V03vinv172u:6683: deva tad api na śakyaṃ te kartum;
V03vinv172u:6685: tathā kariṣye yathā na praghātyate iti
V03vinv172u:6697: tad yadi dārakaṃ janayiṣyati sa eva jīvitād vyaparopyate iti;
V03vinv172u:6702: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6706: sa jātamātra eva kaivartīṃ dhanena pralobhya parivartitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6712: sa dārakaḥ kaivartyā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ mahān saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6715: tasya kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6723: putrābhilāṣiṇī ākāṃkṣaty eva darśanaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate iti;
V03vinv172u:6724: tasyā goniṣādena avaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā upāyasaṃvidhānena matsyāṃ kṛtvā praveśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6726: eṣa kaviḥ kaivartadārako rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya,
V03vinv172u:6727: svayam eva paṭṭāṃ badhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:6732: sa itaś cāmutaś ca niṣpalāyamāno vṛddhayuvatyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6734: tato haridratailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā maṃce āropya mṛta iti kṛtvā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6737: tasmin pradeśe anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣpaphalāni paryeṣate;
V03vinv172u:6740: tair asau puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: bho (SBV II 181)
V03vinv172u:6741: puruṣa na tvayā īdṛśaḥ pramāṇena varṇena ca anena pathā gacchan kaścin manuṣyo dṛṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:6748: rajakena vastravaraṇḍena veṣṭayitvā gardabhe āropya karvaṭakān niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6762: na mayā kadācid evaṃrūpā upānahā kṛtapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:6767: yat pṛṣṭhaṃ tad iha mamāgrataḥ kuruṣva // iti
V03vinv172u:6771: sa tena upānahau prāvṛtya upacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6775: rājñā śravaparamparayā śrutaṃ yathā asau nāgair nāgabhavanaṃ praveśitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6779: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ upanītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6783: evaṃ deveti sarve āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tannāgabhavanaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6784: anyatarasyāṃ cāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma yakṣo māṃsarudhirabhakṣaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6785: tasya bhayāt śvāpadā api tam aṭavīṃ parityajanti;
V03vinv172u:6786: kim uta manuṣyāḥ sā piṅgalāṭavīti prakāśā (SBV II 182)
V03vinv172u:6787: saṃvṛttā; āhituṇḍikena sa nāgas tathā mantrabalādhānād upadruto yathā (A 491a)
V03vinv172u:6788: santrastaḥ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ chorito na śaktas tām atikrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:6790: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yad asau piṅgalāṭavīṃ nātikrāmitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6802: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi samanveṣyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:6803: sa piṅgalāṭavyām itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6804: piṅgalaś ca yakṣaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe kukkuraiḥ parivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:6805: tenāsau kukkuraiś ca dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6813: bhoḥ puruṣa na tvayā śrutaṃ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma amanuṣyakaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6814: yas tatra praviśati sa taṃ praghātayati iti;
V03vinv172u:6825: sa vṛkṣāt śanair avatīrya prakrāntaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍan;
V03vinv172u:6829: tasya ca ṛṣer anyatamasmin parvate udyānaṃ mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6830: so 'nupūrveṇa śravaparamparayā tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6835: sa patann anyatamena puruṣeṇa śikhāyāṃ gṛhītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6839: mṛto 'yaṃ; gacchāmaḥ iti te śikhām ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti: (SBV II 183)
V03vinv172u:6849: yadi mayā na samanvāhṛto 'bhaviyat prāṇair viyuktaḥ abhaviṣyad iti;
V03vinv172u:6851: īdṛśīṃ vidyāṃ jānīte yayā puruṣaḥ strī bhavati strī puruṣo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6852: sa tena tāṃ vidyāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:6856: vidyayā abhinirmāya vārāṇasīṃ gatvā rājakīye udyāne sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6859: tair laghu laghv eva gatvā sūryanemino rājñaḥ samākhyātaṃ:

V03vinv172u:7222: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'navatapte mahāsarasi dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7223: tasya dvau putrau pūrṇaś ca pūrṇamukhaś ca;
V03vinv172u:7231: te haṃsāḥ pratidinam āgamya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya haṃsādhipater nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:7234: yady aham enaṃ yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi mamātyayād eṣa haṃsayūthaṃ nāśayiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:7236: tena pūrṇaḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca ubhāv apy uktau;
V03vinv172u:7237: yaḥ utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni cāvalokya agrato matsakāsam āgacchati tam ahaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ sthāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7239: tāv itaś cāmutaś ca utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni ca avalokayantāv (A 495a)
V03vinv172u:7241: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7242: tena vārāṇasyām udyānasya nātidūre brahmāvatī nāma puṣkariṇī saraḥprativiśiṣṭatarākhyā;
V03vinv172u:7244: tīre samantāc caturṣv api pārśveṣu anekāni puṣpaphalavṛkṣasahasrāṇi ropitāni;
V03vinv172u:7246: tasyās tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrṇo haṃsaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ avatīrya yatheṣṭagatipracāratayā krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7252: tena laghu laghv eva gatvā rājyaṃ pratīṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7253: tataḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ vārāṇasīm āgamya brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7254: taṃ tathā pramodavihāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakāyaḥ saṃśayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:7256: brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm alaṃkṛtya sarvajalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya lokasya spṛhām utpādayati;
V03vinv172u:7258: śrutvā sarva eva vārāṇasīnivāsī janakāyaḥ samantād brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ parivārya,
V03vinv172u:7259: tasya visrabdhavihāratāṃ rūpaśobhāṃ ca nirīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7262: sa brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya anekahaṃsaśataparivāraḥ sarvān jalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya (SBV II 194)
V03vinv172u:7263: lokasya spṛhām utpādayan visrabdhavihāratayā tiṣṭhati iti;
V03vinv172u:7265: bhavantaḥ yady evam āhūyantāṃ śākunikāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7268: bhavantaḥ śrūyate brahmāvatyāṃ puṣkariṇyām atiparamadarśanīyavigraho haṃsādhipatiḥ kuto 'py āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7269: sa yuṣmābhir eka akṣataḥ pāśair badhvā matsakāśam āneyaḥ; iti;
V03vinv172u:7274: acikitsya ādāya haṃsayūthaṃ gacchata śīghraṃ hy anavataptam // iti
V03vinv172u:7278: śākunikās te dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7281: te taṃ haṃsādhipatim ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7294: na ca yuṣmābhiḥ kenacid api etau praghātyau iti;
V03vinv172u:7299: gacchata bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata deva evaṃ samājñāpayati,
V03vinv172u:7300: na kenacid madviṣayanivāsinā jalacarāḥ pakṣiṇo ghātayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7302: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrṇamukho haṃsādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7303: yā sā tasya patnī sa evāsāv ānandaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7305: etāny eva tāni ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7310: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:7311: ānandena bhikṣuṇā na parityakta tac chrūyatām (SBV II 195)
V03vinv172u:7315: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:7316: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām aṭṭo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7317: tasya paṃcāmātyaśatāni yeṣām anubhāvāt prātisīmaiḥ koṭṭarājabhir nābhibhūyate;
V03vinv172u:7318: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathāt karadaṇḍī nāma sahasrayodhī abhyāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7322: tad arhati devo 'sya parigrahaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:7325: yāvad apareṇa samayena aṭṭasya rājñaḥ bhūmyantarā rājānaḥ upacittabalasādhanāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7326: te caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭaṃ rājānam abhigatāḥ yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7327: aṭṭo 'pi rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7328: aṭṭena rājñā bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ jītāḥ bhītaḥ bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtāḥ svaksvakān viṣayān gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7329: taiḥ punar api sannipatya aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃcāmātyaśatāni upaskāreṇa bhagnāni:
V03vinv172u:7333: tato bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ punar api caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭam rājānam abhigatā yauddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7334: aṭṭo 'pi nāma caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:7335: aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃca amātyaśatāni yuddhe vartamāne pratinivartya karaṇḍdinā sahasrayodhena sārdhaṃ yoddhum ārabdhāni (A 496a)
V03vinv172u:7339: mitraṃ te karadaṇḍī tu tvām eko na prahāsyati // iti
V03vinv172u:7341: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sāv aṭṭo nāma rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7342: yā 'sau karadaṇḍī sahasrayodhaḥ ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7343: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7351: The story of a lion and his jackal-friend
V03vinv172u:7352: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:7353: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7354: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;
V03vinv172u:7355: siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:7357: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7361: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
V03vinv172u:7362: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7366: tatas tad udapānaṃ palvalāt salilena pūrṇaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7369: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāny api /
V03vinv172u:7370: paśya siṃhaḥ sṛgālena jīrṇakūpāt samuddhṛtaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7371: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sīmhaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7372: sṛgāla ānando bhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7373: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca sṛgālaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7375: ānandena na parityaktaḥ; etarhy apy (SBV II 197)
V03vinv172u:7377: bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:7379: The story of a Mṛgī and Mṛgādhipati
V03vinv172u:7380: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe paṃcānāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ mṛgādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:7381: yāvad anyatamena lubdhakena mṛgāṇāṃ vadhāya prabhūtāḥ kūṭapāśāḥ lepāś ca vyavasthāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7382: sa ca mṛgādhipatiḥ visrabdhavihāratayā paṃcaśataparivāro mṛgadāve paribhramati;
V03vinv172u:7384: taṃ baddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mṛgā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7388: taṃ tathā calantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgī gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7392: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:7393: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti
V03vinv172u:7394: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ dhanurbāṇapāṇiḥ kāṣāyavastravasitaḥ taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:7395: adrākṣīt sā mṛgī taṃ lubdhakaṃ vadhāyodyataṃ mṛgādhipatim upasaṃkrāntaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7396: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7398: āgato hy eṣa lubdho 'sau pāśo yenaiṣa āhṛtaḥ //iti
V03vinv172u:7400: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:7401: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti (SBV II 198)
V03vinv172u:7402: tataḥ sā mṛgī śūnyahṛdayā taṃ mṛgalubdhakam imāṃ gāthāṃ tatsamīpe bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7404: pūrvaṃ ghātaya māṃ tāvat tataḥ paścān mṛgādhipatam // iti
V03vinv172u:7408: svāmi iti; sa taṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:7409: nāhaṃ tvā ghatāyiṣyāmi na haniṣye mṛgādhipam /
V03vinv172u:7410: saṃgamaṃ te kariṣyāmi priyeṇa patinā saha // iti
V03vinv172u:7412: yathāhaṃ ludha modāmi priyeṇa patinā saha /
V03vinv172u:7413: evaṃ tvaṃ lubdha modasva saha sarvaiḥ svabāndhavaiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7414: tatas tena lubdhena bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayajātena mṛgo muktaḥ
V03vinv172u:7415: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7416: yā sā mṛgī ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7417: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca mṛgaśatāni etāny eva ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:7422: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7423: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ pūtiḥ pūtinā lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7426: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7429: The story of a jackal competing with an elephant
V03vinv172u:7431: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin paravataikadeśe mahat padmasaraḥ;
V03vinv172u:7434: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastī tasmāt padmasarasaḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā uttiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:7437: yuddhaṃ vā anuprayaccha mārgaṃ vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7441: śuṇḍayā vā dantena vā aśucinā vā nāśayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7445: na tvā padbhyāṃ haniṣyāmi na dantābhyāṃ na śuṇḍayā /
V03vinv172u:7446: pūtinā tvāṃ haniṣyāmi pūtir hanyeta pūtinā // iti
V03vinv172u:7452: vacanamātreṇaiva eṣa bhagno mayā yena tvaritatvaritaṃ niṣpalāyitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7454: hastinā samīpaṃ gataṃ jñātvā tasyopari mahatā vegena purīṣaṃ muktaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7456: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena tadāpy eṣa pūtinā pūtir hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7457: etarhy apy eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ
V03vinv172u:7459: seemingly because of an error of the scribe himself.]
V03vinv172u:7460: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7461: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7464: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7467: The story of Āgneya, the cat
V03vinv172u:7469: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe mūṣikāṇāṃ yūthapatiḥ paṃcaśataparivāro 'vatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:7476: pūrvam ahaṃ taruṇāvasthāyāṃ śaktaḥ parākrameṇa mūṣikān grahītum;
V03vinv172u:7478: kiṃ tu upāyasaṃvidhānena bhakṣayāmi iti; sa śanair (SBV II 200)
V03vinv172u:7481: sa muṣikavivarasya nātidūre kṛtakena tapas tapyati;
V03vinv172u:7482: sa mūṣikair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭaḥ śānteneryāpathena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7490: te taṃ pratidinaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vivaraṃ praviśanti;
V03vinv172u:7503: yāvat tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ paścimaṃ mūṣikaṃ bhakṣayan;
V03vinv172u:7504: sa tam upasaṃkramya dūreṇa gatvā gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:7507: nāyaṃ śikhī dharmaśikhī arthahetor ayaṃ śikhī /
V03vinv172u:7508: svasti te 'gneya bhavatu parihīyanti mūṣakāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7509: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena āgneyo biḍālaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ;
V03vinv172u:7511: etarhy apy anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ
V03vinv172u:7512: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7513: paśya bhadanta ye bhagavato dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7514: ye devadattaḥ dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7517: yathā atīte 'py adhvany ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7518: ye dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7521: The story of a bull that got entangled other bulls into trouble by bad counsels
V03vinv172u:7522: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:7523: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau paṃcabhiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyaharamāṇau kāntāramārgaṃ pratipannau;
V03vinv172u:7524: tavyoḥ kāntāramārgapratipannayoḥ kadācid balīvardānāṃ parītto yavaso bhavati;
V03vinv172u:7527: tato 'sau sārthaḥ saha balīvardaiḥ atīva pariśrāntaḥ kṛcchreṇa kāntāmārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati anyatarasmin pradeśe haritaśādvalaṃ salilasaṃpannaṃ ca snātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7529: tatas te balīvardāḥ parīttena pānyena yavasena ca parikhinnāḥ,
V03vinv172u:7530: paryāptaṃ yavasaṃ pānīyaṃ ca pītvā viśrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7531: teṣāṃ yaḥ pradhāno balīvardaḥ sa tān prabodhayati:
V03vinv172u:7532: bhavanto vayaṃ parīttena yavasena parīttena ca pānīyena parikheditāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7534: yadi bhavatām abhipretam ihaiva haṭhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7539: evam ukte pradhānabalīvardo ruṣitaḥ svayūthyān kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7541: dṛṣṭam ebhir yuṣmābhir na voḍhavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:7544: sārthikā prabhūtān prahārān datvā pratodayaṣṭibhir ātāḍya ātāḍya rudhireṇa pragharatā śakaṭe yojitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7548: mithyā hi coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
V03vinv172u:7550: samyak ca coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
V03vinv172u:7551: te vai nistīrṇakāntārāḥ jalaṃ śītaṃ pibanti hi //
V03vinv172u:7552: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pradhāno balīvardaḥ yena te samyag eva coditāḥ ahaṃ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena; yena tu (SBV II 202)
V03vinv172u:7553: balīvardā viprasthāpitāḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7554: tadāpi yair mama vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ kāntāramārgaṃ nistīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7555: yair devadattasya vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7556: etarhy api ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntāramārgād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7557: ye devadattasya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ
V03vinv172u:7558: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7559: paśya bhadanta devadatto mūrkho murkhaparivāraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7562: yathā atīte 'py adhvani devadatto mūrkho mūrkhaparivāraḥ;
V03vinv172u:7565: The story of the leader of the monkeys
V03vinv172u:7567: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin araṇyāyatane markaṭayūthapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7583: tasyāpy aparo lagna ity evaṃ sarve lagnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7591: yeṣām iha hi mūrkāṇāṃ mūrkho bhavati nāyakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:7592: sarve te nidhanaṃ yānti candroddhārā iva vānarāḥ // iti

V03vinv172u:7597: The five causes of the division of the congregation
V03vinv172u:7600: tathāgatasya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny (A 498b)
V03vinv172u:7605: bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām;
V03vinv172u:7609: yāvat buddho loke utpadyate lokas tāvat tanmukho 'vatiṣṭhate buddhaḥ kila mārṣā loka utpanna iti;
V03vinv172u:7612: aham eva śāstā iti tasya vaktavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7613: yadā bhagavān jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati tadā tvaṃ kva āsīḥ?
V03vinv172u:7614: arbude anutpanne saṃgho na bhidyate dṛṣṭyarbude vā śīlārbude vā śrāvakayuge anirdiṣṭe saṃgho na bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:7615: tat kasya hetoḥ saṃgho bhinnaḥ avaśyaṃ śrāvakayugaṃ pratisandhatte;
V03vinv172u:7617: tat kasya hetoḥ antaḥsīmni saṃgho bhidyate na bahiḥsīmni
V03vinv172u:7621: mama nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe arbudam utpannaṃ śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:7627: yadi tāvat śaikṣāśaikṣaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gamiṣyāmi na śakṣyati devadattaḥ saṃghabhedaṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7628: yannv ahaṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccheyam;
V03vinv172u:7629: iti viditvā āyuṣmatā rāhulena upasthāyakena paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7630: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ iti (SBV II 204)
V03vinv172u:7633: division of the congregation and new rules imparted by Devadatta
V03vinv172u:7634: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:7638: icchāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ imāṃ traimāsīṃ pratisaṃlātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7639: na me kenacid bhikṣuṇā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7641: bhikṣusaṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid asmākam imāṃ traimāsīṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:7643: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau dakṣiṇāgiriṣu varṣā upagatau;
V03vinv172u:7645: sa trayāṇāṃ va dvikānāṃ vā māsānām atyayād bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:7646: śramaṇa āyuṣmanto gautama evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:7647: āraṇyakatvena bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:7649: traicīvarikatvena ābhyavakāśikatvena śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:7650: yasya cāyuṣmantaḥ imāni paṃca vratapadāni na rocante na kṣamante na saṃprakhyānti sa śramaṇasya gautamasya ārād bhavatu durād bhavatu;
V03vinv172u:7656: tena tāni devadattasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv172u:7658: āyuṣmantaḥ kimarthaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham apahāya asya pāpecchasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchata?
V03vinv172u:7660: āyuṣman rāhula evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre bhagavān adarśano vyavasthitaḥ; vayaṃ (SBV II 205)
V03vinv172u:7662: yadi devadattena traimāsīṃ bhikṣusaṃgho na pratipādito 'bhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:7680: trisahasramahāsahasre lokadhātau dharmacakraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ na satvasantāne vartate
V03vinv172u:7682: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit the Buddha and promise to him to restore the congregation
V03vinv172u:7690: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarau niṣṭhitacīvarau samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7692: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7693: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān rāhulo dvare tiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:7694: athāyuṣmān rāhulaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocad upādyāya devadattena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti; (SBV II 206)
V03vinv172u:7700: praviśya bahagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:7703: gachāmo vayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ sandhātum iti
V03vinv172u:7705: The sermon on the four merituous men
V03vinv172u:7708: bahu sa puṇyaṃ prasūyate apramāṇam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte,
V03vinv172u:7709: tadyathā śatachinnaṃ vālaṃ yaḥ koṭyā koṭiṃ pratisandadhyāt;
V03vinv172u:7710: evam eva sa bahu puṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte
V03vinv172u:7711: catvāra ime śāriputramaudgalyāyanau brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavanti;
V03vinv172u:7713: yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:7714: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7716: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe caturdiśasya bhikṣusaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:7717: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7719: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ sandhatte;
V03vinv172u:7720: ayaṃ tritīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7722: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7723: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:7724: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena (SBV II 207)
V03vinv172u:7725: mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7726: evaṃ karuṇāmuditaupekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:7727: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:7728_0: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa
V03vinv172u:7728_1: asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya
V03vinv172u:7729: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:7732: Śāriputra and Mahāmaudgalyāyana visit Devadatta and exhort the misguided monks to return to the true doctrine
V03vinv172u:7733: āthāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7734: tena khalu samayena devadatto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu buddhalīlayā anudharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:7743: tau saṃlakṣayataḥ eṣa evāsmākaṃ doṣo yad asmābhir asya saṃghabhede sāhāyyaṃ kalpitam;
V03vinv172u:7746: balavān eṣa niyatam asmān hanti iti;
V03vinv172u:7750: tatra devadattaḥ āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate pratibhātu te śāriputra bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:7754: atha devadattaś caturguṇam uttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayitvā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7757: tatra āyuṣmān śāriputro bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:7759: uttānakaḥ kāyena krathamānena middham avakrāntaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7760: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:7762_0: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte pūrvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:7762_1: diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati
V03vinv172u:7764: tejodhātusamāpannasya āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya vividhāny arciṃṣi kāyān niścaranti nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni māñjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
V03vinv172u:7766: adhaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati uparimāt kāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:7767: uparimaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati addhaḥkāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:7768: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi;
V03vinv172u:7769: iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidhaṃ ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7770: āyuṣmantā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena te bhikṣavaḥ saṃvejitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7771: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7772: yaṃ śrutvā devadatte nirapekṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; uktāś ca:
V03vinv172u:7773: yeṣāṃ vaḥ āyuṣmantaḥ śāstā priyaḥ te uttiṣṭhantu;
V03vinv172u:7776: Many misled monks are led back to the Buddha and readmitted into the order without a word of reproach
V03vinv172u:7783: yadi devadattasa apaśyataḥ parṣadaṃ neṣyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:7786: devadatto 'pi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena akṣiṇī saṃparimārjan pradhāvitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7789: devadattaḥ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattaiḥ sārdhaṃ samantatas tāṃ gartāṃ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7793: atha ca punar anayena vyasanam āpatsyāmi;
V03vinv172u:7795: āyuṣmantāv api śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣusaṃgham ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:7796: atha te bhikṣavaḥ ālekhajātāḥ madgubhūtāḥ srastaskandhā adhomukhā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmanti:
V03vinv172u:7797: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavantam aprameyaguṇasamanvāgatam apahāya pāpecchaṃ devadattaṃ saṃsṛtāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7798: atha bhagavān teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:7801: kadācit karhicid āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7802: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpadyante;
V03vinv172u:7803: kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya loke dharmadeśanā prajñāyate;
V03vinv172u:7804: tad idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sudurlabhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ yaduta āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ,
V03vinv172u:7805: indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:7806: ahaṃ caitarhi śāstā loka utpannaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:7807: dharmaś ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī saugatapratisaṃveditaḥ yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv172u:7810_0: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ
V03vinv172u:7810_1: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyaym
V03vinv172u:7810_2: upādānaṃ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ bhavapratyayā jātiḥ jātipratyayāḥ jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti;
V03vinv172u:7811: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:7814_0: yaduta avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhān
V03vinv172u:7815_0: tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodhaḥ upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj
V03vinv172u:7815_2: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
V03vinv172u:7817: bhikṣavaḥ ātmārthaṃ samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7818: kaccin naḥ pravrajya amoghā bhaviṣyanti kriyāḥ saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7819_1: teṣāṃ te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhaviṣyanti mahānuśaṃsāḥ mahādyutayaḥ mahāvistārāḥ
V03vinv172u:7820_0: yadā te bhikṣavo bhagavatā svāgatavādena supravrajitavādena samudācaritāḥ tadā teṣāṃ
V03vinv172u:7820_1: yat tad abhūn madgutvaṃ kaukṛtyam ālekhaḥ vilekhaḥ vipratisāraḥ tat sarveṇa sarvaṃ prativigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:7821: tato 'nye bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7822: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7824: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām
V03vinv172u:7826: The story of a ṛṣi living in the country
V03vinv172u:7827: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:7828: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite anekapakṣigaṇaniṣevite ṛṣiḥ prativasati paṃcānām ṛṣiśatānāṃ pramukhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7829: yāvad anyaḥ ṛṣiḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran tadāśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7830: sa tena ṛṣiṇā na samyak pratimānitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7832: ayaṃ pāpecchaḥ ṛṣir na kiṃcid api jānīte;
V03vinv172u:7835: ahaṃ yuṣmān paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:7836: tena bhidyamānās te tasya ṛṣer avavādena avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv172u:7838: anena pāpakāriṇā mamaite ṛṣayo bhinnāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7843: nāvatiṣṭhate iti sa ṛṣir durmanāḥ upāyasaṃvidhānena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7844: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka (SBV II 211)
V03vinv172u:7846: atha anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7849: tena tasmai kārān kṛtvā mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ:
V03vinv172u:7850: yan mamānena pāparṣiṇā parṣadbhedaḥ kṛtaḥ aham asya sarvajñeyavaśiprāptasyāpi parṣadbhedaṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:7851: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jānapadaḥ ṛṣiḥ yena tasya ṛṣeḥ parṣad bhinnā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7852: yo 'sau naivāsikaḥ ṛṣiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7853: yan mayā asya parṣad bhinnā tasya karmaṇo vipākena anena mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā saṃgho mama bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7854: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvavad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:7857: paśya bhadanta devadattena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā iti;
