V03vinv172u:9255: ehy āvām avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatvā devadattam āśvāsayāva iti;
V03vinv172u:9259: samanvāhara āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana nārakān satvān iti;
V03vinv172u:9260: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte musalamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9261: tad udakam avīcikābhir jvālābhir antarāt paryādīyate;
V03vinv172u:9262: evam īṣāmātrābhir akṣamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9271: yo bhagavato bhrātā devadattaḥ sa āgacchatv iti;
V03vinv172u:9277: yā tāvad āvīcikaiḥ satvaiḥ sādhāraṇatā sthitā sā evāstu mama;
V03vinv172u:9278: yāḥ prātipaudgalikā vartante tāḥ śṛṇu: (MSV IV 238)
V03vinv172u:9283: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:9288: ayasmayāḥ parvatā āgacchanti ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:9290: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatāc chilā kṣiptā tasyaitat karmaṇaḥ phalam
V03vinv172u:9292: ubhayatodantakaiḥ krakacair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair aṅgapratyaṅgāni pāṭyante iti;
V03vinv172u:9293: tathā hi tvayā bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9296: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:9297: tathā hi tvayā utpalavarṇā bhikṣuṇī arhantī khaṭaprahāreṇa praghātitā;
V03vinv172u:9302: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya dhanapālako hastināga utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9310: bhadanta śāriputra yady evam utsahe aham ekapārśvenāvīcau mahānarake sthātum iti
V03vinv172u:9312: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit in hell followers of Devadatta,
V03vinv172u:9317: yāvat kokālikasya hi jihvā halaśatena dhāryate;
V03vinv172u:9319: kokālikābhiprasādya śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittaṃ peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāribhir vatsalayor iti;
V03vinv172u:9320: evam ukto kokālika āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9322: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva kokālikasya halasahareṇa jihvā pāṭayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:9323: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanāv akaraṇīyā hy ete iti viditvā prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:9325: atha pūraṇaḥ kāśyapa āyuṣmantoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9326: ārya śāriputra mayā mithyādharmadeśanayā mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9327: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena jihvāyāṃ paṃca halaśatāni vahanti;
V03vinv172u:9328: yathā yathā ca śrāvakā stūpakārān kurvanti tathā tathā tīvrataravedanāṃ vedayāmi;
V03vinv172u:9329: tad arhasi madīyām avasthāṃ teṣāṃ nivedya nivārayituṃ:
V03vinv172u:9331: tatheti pratijñāya āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau narakacārikāṃ (MSV IV 240)
V03vinv172u:9333: tābhyāṃ bhagavato bhikṣūṇāṃ janakāsya devadattakokālikapūraṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ narakopapannānām avasthā vistareṇa samākhyātā
V03vinv172u:9334: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:9335: paśya bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam avacanīkṛtyāvīcau mahānarake (A 519b)
V03vinv172u:9337: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9340: The story of the bull and the ass
V03vinv172u:9341: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9342: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'niyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo goṣūpapanno vṛṣo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:9343: sa rātrau nagarān nirgamya rājakīye māṣakṣetre carati;
V03vinv172u:9345: yāvat tasya sakāśaṃ gardabhaḥ upasamkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:9347: na cāhaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi kadācic carantam iti;
V03vinv172u:9351: aham api mātula tvayā sārdhaṃ carāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9356: tau vāṭaṃ bhaṅktvā rājakīye māṣakṣetre nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:9357: gardabhas tāvat tūṣṇīm avasthito yāvad āśito jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9361: tiṣṭha tāvan uhūrtaṃ yāvad ahaṃ nirgacchāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9367: bhavantaḥ anena gardabhena sarvam idaṃ rājakīyaṃ māṣakṣetraṃ bhakṣitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9369: taiḥ karṇau cchitvā ulūkhalaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9370: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman vṛṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9372: sādhu gītaṃ suṣṭhu gītaṃ prāptaṃ gītasya tat phalam /
V03vinv172u:9374: evaṃ hi tasya bhavati yo vācaṃ ca na rakṣati /
V03vinv172u:9377: tūṣṇīṃ bhava khaṇḍadanta tūṣṇīṃ bhava jaradgava /
V03vinv172u:9378: tvām apy atra gaveṣanto daṇḍahastās trayo janāḥ // iti /
V03vinv172u:9381: yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9382: yo 'sau gardabha eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9383: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena (SBV II 266)
V03vinv172u:9385: punar api yathaiva mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:9387: The story of the bull and the jackal
V03vinv172u:9388: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9391: tenāsau śramaṇabrāhmaṇān svajanān anāthakṛpaṇavanīpakān bhojayitvā yatheṣṭapracārī utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9392: so 'pareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman kaluṣe magno 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9400: yadi śṛgāla āgamiṣyati tasyāhaṃ śṛṅge pāśaṃ kṣepsyāmīti; sa tasya (A 520a)
V03vinv172u:9411: gaccha tvam asmāt pradeśān mā anayena vyasanam āpatsyasa iti;
V03vinv172u:9414: nāhaṃ bisāny utkhanāmi puṇḍarīkāni nāpy aham /
V03vinv172u:9415: saced bhakṣitukāmo 'si pṛṣṭhato gaccha bhakṣaya // iti /
V03vinv172u:9421: kiṃ naṭo nartako vā tvam uta śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:9422: grāme vidarśyatāṃ śilpam araṇye nāsti dāyakaḥ // iti / (SBV II 267)
V03vinv172u:9424: nāhaṃ naṭo nartako vā nāpi śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:9425: dattā śakeṇa me śreṇī brahmalokaṃ vrajāmy aham // iti / (MSV IV 243)
V03vinv172u:9427: na śakro dadāti śreṇīṃ brahmalokaḥ kutas tava /
V03vinv172u:9428: baddho 'si kūṭapāśena na te paśyāmi jīvitam // iti /
V03vinv172u:9430: yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9431: yo 'sau śṛgāla eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9432: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9433: etarhy apy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannaḥ
V03vinv172u:9434: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:9435: bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciparāyaṇaḥ saṃvṛtta iti;
V03vinv172u:9437: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vikrośato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciparāyaṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9440: The story of the King Caitika and the two sons of the Purohita
V03vinv172u:9441: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9442: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājā caitiko nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:9444: tasya rājñaḥ purohitasya dvau putau jyeṣṭho kanīyāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:9447: jyeṣṭhaḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa paurohityaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9456: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣa itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramaṃs tasya (MSV IV 244)
V03vinv172u:9471: aham eva tatra gatvā ahitān nivārayiṣyāmi hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā na janapadān nipīḍayatīti;
V03vinv172u:9472: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā jñātīnām etat prakaraṇaṃ niveditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9475: deva mama sa jyeṣṭho bhrātā āgamiṣyatīti;
V03vinv172u:9479: deva tvaṃ nāma mayā iyantaṃ kālaṃ vṛthā sevita iti;
V03vinv172u:9482: apitv ekena prakāreṇa tava paurohityaṃ bhavatv iti;
V03vinv172u:9494: yadi tava na pratyayo vayaṃ rājakule vṛddhāṃs devaṃ ca pṛcchāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9496: kathaya bho rājan ka āvayor jyeṣṭha iti;
V03vinv172u:9501: sa pṛthivyāṃ patito mukhāc cāsya pūtigandhaḥ pravāti;
V03vinv172u:9504: mukhaṃ ca pūtikaṃ bhavati svargāc ca parihīyate //
V03vinv172u:9505: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyati yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9506: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9508: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9509: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā / (SBV II 269)
V03vinv172u:9510: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9511: apumān jāyate tatra pumāṃs tatra na jāyate /
V03vinv172u:9512: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9513: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9514: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9515: varṣaty akāle devaś ca kāle tatra na varṣati /
V03vinv172u:9516: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet //
V03vinv172u:9517: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9518: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9519: dve jihve bhavatas tasyoragasyeva hi jantunaḥ /
V03vinv172u:9520: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet // (MSV IV 246)
V03vinv172u:9521: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:9522: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:9523: ity evaṃ caitiko rājā karma kṛtvā sudāruṇam /
V03vinv172u:9526: yo 'sau jyeṣṭhaḥ purohitaputraḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9527: yo 'sau caitiko rājā eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9528: tadāpy eṣa mama vikrośato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9529: etarhy apy eṣa mamavikrośato vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptaḥ (A 521a)
V03vinv172u:9530: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:9531: paśya bhadanta devadatto hitam ucyamāno vacanam aśṛṇvann avīciparāyaṇaḥ saṃvṛtta iti;
V03vinv172u:9533: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa mayā hitam ucyamāno vacanam aśṛṇvann anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9536: The story of the master-mechanic and his pupil
V03vinv172u:9537: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:9540: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:9541: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:9542: sāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:9545: vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9550: tenānyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapateḥ sakāśād dārikā prārthitā;
V03vinv172u:9563: sa ten sārdhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ mayūram abhiruhya yasminn eva divase avadhiḥ kṛtas tasminn eva divase karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9565: tato dārikāṃ pratigṛhya punas tad yantram āruhya svagṛham āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:9566: yantraṃ saṃgṛhya mātuḥ samarpitam uktaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:9567: ayaṃ tava putro yantrasya pravartanayogaṃ jānīte no tu nivartanaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9570: amba prayaccha me yantraṃ mahājanakāyam anvāvartayāmīti;
V03vinv172u:9573: ayaṃ pravartanaprayogaṃ jānīte no tu nivartanaṃ;
V03vinv172u:9577: amba pravartanam apy ahaṃ jānāṃi nivartanam api;
V03vinv172u:9578: kiṃ tv asāv ācāryo mātsaryeṇa na dadātīti;
V03vinv172u:9586: sa yathā yathā saṃbhramād āmreḍayati (MSV IV 248)
V03vinv172u:9593: yo hy arthakāmasya hitānukampino vaco na gṛhṇāti yathānuśiṣṭam /
V03vinv172u:9594: sa uhyate dārumayeṇa pakṣiṇā anāyako na śṛṇotīha kasyacit // iti /
V03vinv172u:9597: yo 'sau yantrakalācāryaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9598: yo 'sau tasyāntevāsī eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:9599: tadāpy eṣa vacanam aśṛṇvann anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:9600: etarhy apy eṣa mayā hitam ucyamāno mama vacanam aśṛṇvann anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ (SBV II 271) (A 521b)
V03vinv172u:9604: ucyate bhadanta saṃghabhedaḥ ucyate bhadanta saṃghasāmagrī iti;
V03vinv172u:9606: yataś copālin bhikṣavaḥ dharme 'dharmsaṃjñinaḥ adharme dharmasaṃjñino vyagre avyagrasaṃjñinaḥ karmāṇi kurvanti;
V03vinv172u:9608: yatas tu dharme dharmasaṃjñinaḥ samagre samagrasaṃjñinaḥ karmāṇi kurvanti;
V03vinv172u:9610: yatraiko bhikṣur na tatra saṃgho bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:9611: yatrau dvau yatra trayo yāvad aṣṭau na tatra saṃgho bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:9612: yatra nava bhikṣavo uttare vā tatra dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃgho bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:9615: yathāpitad devadatto bhikṣūṇāṃ jñāpayati saṃjñāpayati śikṣayati grāhayati:
V03vinv172u:9616: paṃcabhir āyuṣmanto vratapadair bhikṣuḥ śudhyati vimucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati;
V03vinv172u:9619: āraṇyakatvena āyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śudhyati vimucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati;
V03vinv172u:9621: vṛkṣamūlikatvena paiṇḍapātikatvena traicīvarikatvena pāṃsukūlikatvenāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śudhyati vimucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati;
V03vinv172u:9623: yeṣāṃ yuṣmākam āyuṣmantaḥ na kṣamante ebhiḥ paṃcabhiḥ vratapadaiḥ śodhuṃ moktuṃ niryātuṃ te śramaṇasya gautamasyārād bhavantu,
V03vinv172u:9625: dūreṇa pareṇa bhavantu ity eṣā jñaptiḥ;
V03vinv172u:9628: yathāpitad devadatto bhikṣūṇāṃ jñāpayati saṃjñāpayati śikṣayati grāhayati:
V03vinv172u:9630: bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati;
V03vinv172u:9633: āraṇyakatvenāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati;
